name: Scindo Prime
description: The primed version of the Scindo, the Scindo Prime offers improved overall statistics to the original, with increased damage, speed, critical chance, and status. Providing a formidable weapon surpassing the original, and many of its peers in the heavy blade category. Like the original, the Scindo Prime is also compatible with the Manticore skin, providing damage at the cost of speed.

name: Ember Prime
description: Release Date: November 20th, 2013. Ember Prime is the primed variant of the Ember Warframe with more powerful stats; possessing higher shields and armor, as well as a  and  polarity.

name: Loki Prime
description: Release Date: June 11th, 2014. Loki Prime is the primed variant of the Loki Warframe featuring more powerful stats: possessing a higher energy capacity, as well as an additional  and a  polarity.

name: Hammer Shot
description: Hammer Shot increases the critical damage multiplier and the status effect chance of rifles.

name: Seeking Force
description: The Seeking Force mod increases Punch Through of a shotgun starting at 0.4 meters, with a maximum of 2.1 meters at rank 5.

name: Target Cracker
description: The Target Cracker mod increases the critical damage of a pistol by 10% for each rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 5.

name: Fleeting Expertise
description: Fleeting Expertise increases Power Efficiency but reduces Power Duration of Warframe abilities.

name: Critical Delay
description: The Critical Delay mod increases the critical hit chance by 8% per rank while reducing the fire rate by -6% per rank of rifles for a maximum of 48% critical hit chance and -36% fire rate at rank 5.

name: Ruinous Extension
description: Ruinous Extension increases the range of pistol weapons.

name: Savagery
description: Savagery mod allows the Sunika Kubrow to overwhelm its prey with a powerful finisher attack.

name: Expel Infested
description: Expel Infested increases the damage of secondary weapons against the Infested.

name: Warrior
description: Warrior allows Wyrm to attack the first visible enemy in range.

name: Combustion Rounds
description: The Combustion Rounds mod adds  Heat damage on Archwing guns by 20% per rank at a maximum of 120% at rank 5.

name: Sniper Ammo Mutation
description: Sniper Ammo Mutation is an sniper rifle mod that converts any unused ammo type into Sniper Ammo. The affected sniper rifle will only convert ammo while equipped, and will not convert any ammo type used by holstered secondary weapons until their own ammo is full.

name: Pistol Gambit
description: The Pistol Gambit mod increases the critical hit chance of a pistol by 20% per rank for a maximum of 120% at rank 5.

name: Blind Rage
description: Blind Rage increases Power Strength while reducing Power Efficiency of Warframe abilities.

name: Rifle Ammo Mutation
description: Rifle Ammo Mutation is an assault rifle mod that converts any unused ammo type into Rifle Ammo. The affected rifle will only convert ammo while equipped, and will not convert any ammo type used by holstered secondary weapons until their own ammo is full.

name: Magnum Force
description: Magnum Force increases damage of secondary weapons at the cost of reduced accuracy by 6% and -3% per rank, at a maximum of 66% and -33% at rank 10, respectively.

name: Gleaming Blight
description: The Gleaming Blight mod is a Weapon Augment Mod that increases status chance and Blight specifically for the Dark Dagger. It increases status chance by 25% and Blight by 0.25 per rank, at a maximum of 100% and 1 at rank 3, respectively.

name: Vile Precision
description: The Vile Precision mod decreases weapon recoil by -10% per rank and fire rate by -6% per rank of primary weapons for a maximum of -60% weapon recoil and -36% fire rate at Rank 5.

name: Parallax Scope
description: The Parallax Scope mod increases the critical hit chance of an Archwing gun by 20% per rank for a maximum of 80% at rank 3.

name: Vitality
description: Vitality increases the Maximum Health of a Warframe.

name: Sniper Scavenger
description: Sniper Scavenger is an Aura that increases the amount of sniper ammo recovered per drop.

name: Barrel Diffusion
description: Barrel Diffusion increases the multishot of pistols. These additional rounds do not consume extra ammunition.

name: Whirlwind
description: Whirlwind increases the flight speed of Glaive weapons. As a direct result, this mod also increases throwing distance.

name: Antitoxin
description: Antitoxin increases the Toxin resistance of a Warframe's health.

name: Disruptor
description: Disruptor increases the  Impact damage of Shotguns.

name: Heavy Caliber
description: Heavy Caliber increases damage of Primary Weapons (excluding Shotguns) at the cost of reduced accuracy by 15% and -5% per rank, at a maximum of 165% and -55% at rank 10, respectively.

name: Piercing Hit
description: The Piercing Hit mod increases  Puncture damage for rifles.

name: Continuity
description: Continuity increases the Power Duration of a Warframe's abilities.

name: Tainted Clip
description: Tainted Clip increases pistol magazine capacity while decreasing reload speed.

name: Freeze Force
description: Freeze Force is a Warframe Augment Mod for Frost that allows Freeze to be cast on allies, temporarily granting them additional  Cold damage to all attacks.

name: Swirling Tiger
description: Swirling Tiger is one of two available Stance mods for Dual Swords type weapons. Its sweeping attacks specialize in dealing damage across multiple foes.

name: Shock Trooper
description: Shock Trooper is a Warframe Augment Mod for Volt that allows Shock to be cast on allies, temporarily granting them additional  Electric damage to all attacks.

name: Quick Thinking
description: Quick Thinking is a mod that uses the Warframe's residual energy pool as an emergency buffer to prevent death whenever a player drops to 2 Health.

name: Flow
description: Flow increases the Maximum Energy reserve of a Warframe.

name: Blazing Steel
description: The Blazing Steel mod adds  Heat damage on Archwing melee weapons by 20% per rank at a maximum of 120% at rank 5.

name: Critical Deceleration
description: The Critical Deceleration mod increases the critical hit chance by 8% per rank while reducing the Fire Rate by -5% per rank of shotguns for a maximum of 48% critical hit chance and -30% fire rate at rank 5.

name: Fired Up
description: Fired Up is a Sentinel mod that increases the damage of a sentinel after continuously firing its weapon for a set amount of time.

name: Expel Corpus
description: Expel Corpus increases the damage of secondary weapons against Corpus.

name: Shattering Storm
description: Shattering Storm is one of two Stance mods for Hammer type weapons, specializing in high impact smashes.

name: Lingering Torment
description: Lingering Torment increases the duration of Status Effects inflicted by Shotguns.

name: Provoked
description: Provoked increases the damage dealt by a Warframe while in bleedout.

name: Spoiled Strike
description: The Spoiled Strike mod increases damage by 25% per rank while reducing attack speed by -5% per rank of melee attacks for a maximum of 100% damage and -20% attack speed at rank 3.

name: Incendiary Coat
description: The Incendiary Coat mod increases  Heat damage of a shotgun by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at rank 5.

name: Split Chamber
description: The Split Chamber mod increases the chance of multishot on rifles by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at Rank 5. These additional rounds do not consume extra ammunition.

name: Safeguard Switch
description: Safeguard Switch is a Warframe Augment Mod for Loki, that makes allies targeted by Switch Teleport become invulnerable to damage for a short period.

name: Enemy Radar
description: Enemy Radar is an Aura that allows you and your teammates to see enemies on your mini-maps.

name: Heated Charge
description: The Heated Charge mod increases  Heat damage of a secondary weapon by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at rank 5.

name: Hellfire
description: The Hellfire mod increases  Heat damage by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at rank 5.

name: Eagle Eye
description: The Eagle Eye mod increases the zoom of a rifle by 10% per rank up to a maximum of 40% at rank 3. Beginning with Update 12.6, Eagle Eye also increases the range at which Sentinels can shoot enemies if installed on a Sentinel Weapon.

name: Argon Plating
description: The Argon Plating mod increases an Archwing's armor by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at rank 5.

name: System Reroute
description: The System Reroute mod enhances an Archwing's Power Efficiency by 5% per rank at a maximum of 55% at rank 10.

name: North Wind
description: The North Wind mod increases  Cold damage on a melee weapon by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at rank 5.

name: Shotgun Scavenger
description: Shotgun Scavenger is an Aura that increases the amount of shotgun ammo recovered per drop.

name: Synoid Gammacor
description: The Synoid Gammacor is an exclusive version of the Gammacor available only from Cephalon Suda, possessing better stats as well as innate Entropy effect.

name: Rakta Ballistica
description: The Rakta Ballistica is an exclusive version of the Ballistica available only from the Red Veil. The Rakta Ballistica has a higher portion of  Puncture damage than its default version, and features a larger magazine as well as innate Blight effect.

name: Wyrm Prime
description: Wyrm Prime is the first Prime Sentinel, a version of Wyrm featuring Orokin styling and modified stats.

name: Fire Fright
description: Fire Fright is a Warframe Augment Mod for Ember that adds a chance to cause enemies hit by the ring of fire to become panicked.

name: Shield Overload
description: Shield Overload is a Warframe Augment Mod for Mag's Shield Polarize in PvP that increases the time for an opponent's shields to begin recharging when hit.

name: Atlantis Vulcan
description: Atlantis Vulcan is a Stance for Nunchaku-type weapons, specializing in fast, multi-hit whirling strikes.

name: Arcane Pulse
description: Arcane Pulse is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance to replenish additional health for you and nearby allies whenever a Health Orb is picked up.

name: Prisma Tetra
description: The Prisma Tetra is the Prisma version of the Corpus Tetra, delivering higher damage, fire rate, status proc, and critical stats.

name: Calculated Shot
description: Calculated Shot  is a Precept mod for the Diriga Sentinel that allows it to engage enemies within sight with a long-range shot. Keep in mind that Diriga will use this ability regardless of the weapon equipped, which has interesting consequences when using Sweeper or Burst Laser.

name: Arc Coil
description: Arc Coil allows Diriga to zap multiple enemies within range, with a chance to stun. It has 10m range and does 100  Electricity damage.

name: Chaos Sphere
description: Chaos Sphere is a Warframe Augment Mod for Nyx that allows Chaos to create a circular radius that affects enemies entering within its range for a fraction of its duration.

name: Hysterical Fixation
description: Hysterical Fixation is a PvP-exclusive Warframe Augment Mod for Valkyr's Hysteria that replenishes a percentage of your shields for every kill while in Hysteria.

name: Marathon
description: Marathon increases the maximum Stamina of a Warframe.

name: Quick Rest
description: Quick Rest increases the Stamina recharge rate of Warframes.

name: Sonic Fracture
description: Sonic Fracture is a Warframe Augment Mod for Banshee's Sonic Boom that allows it to temporarily strip armor off enemies.

name: Defiled Reckoning
description: Defiled Reckoning is a PvP-exclusive Warframe Augment Mod for Oberon's Reckoning that makes Health Orbs created by kills from Reckoning temporarily invisible to, and unusable by, enemies.

name: Hikou Prime
description: The Hikou Prime is the primed version of the Hikou throwing stars, released in Update 14.8.

name: Paris Prime
description: The Paris Prime features higher base and charge damage, and a faster draw time than the Paris. The Paris Prime was added into the game in Update 9.0.

name: Trinity Prime
description: Release Date: October 6th, 2015. Trinity Prime is the primed variant of the Trinity Warframe featuring more powerful stats: possessing a higher shield capacity and sprint speed, as well as having an additional  and  polarity.

name: Vasto Prime
description: The primed version of the Vasto revolver, the Vasto Prime features enhanced damage over the original.

name: Rift Strike
description: Rift Strike is a mod exclusive to the Twin Basolk that causes Charge Attacks to teleport the user directly in melee range of an enemy, provided the user is aiming at them before the charge attack is completed, and the user is standing within the mod's listed range.

name: Vulcan Blitz
description: Vulcan Blitz is a Jat Kittag-exclusive mod that causes enemies killed by the Jat Kittag to explode, dealing a flat amount of  Blast damage plus a percentage of the enemy's maximum health in an area of effect.

name: Fomorian Accelerant
description: Fomorian Accelerant is a Drakgoon-exclusive mod that increases the velocity of the flak projectiles and the number of times each projectile bounces.

name: Imperator Vandal
description: The Imperator Vandal is the Vandal form of the Imperator heavy machine gun for the Archwing flight system, offered as a reward for attaining 15 (10 for PS4/XB1) Battle Points in the Operation Eyes of Blight event.

name: Velocitus
description: The Velocitus is an Archwing Gauss-gun that deals heavy charged shot damage. It is the first Archwing weapon to have base  Magnetic damage.

name: Lith F1 Exceptional
description: Void Relics are Orokin objects that can be opened to reveal valuable treasure enclosed within by completing Void Fissure missions. They are the principal means of acquiring Prime and Forma Blueprints.

name: Neo V1 Exceptional
description: Void Relics are Orokin objects that can be opened to reveal valuable treasure enclosed within by completing Void Fissure missions. They are the principal means of acquiring Prime and Forma Blueprints.

name: Axi S1 Flawless
description: Void Relics are Orokin objects that can be opened to reveal valuable treasure enclosed within by completing Void Fissure missions. They are the principal means of acquiring Prime and Forma Blueprints.

name: Rathbone
description: A heavy Hammer exclusive to Archwing use, the Rathbone primarily deals  Impact damage, which is ideal for taking down Corpus shields. This weapon shares its own basic six combo with Centaur.

name: Latron Wraith
description: The Latron Wraith is the Wraith version of the Latron semi-automatic rifle, which was featured as a reward for players who extracted 3000 Cryotic in a single mission during Operation Cryotic Front and can be found as an Invasion reward.

name: Territorial Aggression
description: The Kavat marks their territory pacifying any wild creature within it.  Wild creatures such as Feral Kubrows and Desert Skates within a certain radius will not attack.

name: Swipe
description: Swipe is a Kavat-exclusive mod that increases their attack range and allows them to hit multiple enemies per strike.

name: Pounce
description: The Kavat pounces at an enemy, stunning them for a short duration.

name: Sharpened Claws
description: Sharpened Claws is a Kavat exclusive mod that allows the Kavat to target an enemy and begin ripping it apart as it is stunned in a "free fall" animation (animation may change in the future). In addition to dealing high damage especially when combined with damage mods and boosts to critical attack damage, each swipe will remove some of the targets Armor if they possess any, making each swipe more deadly and exposing heavy units to more damage from allies.

name: Sense Danger
description: Sense Danger is a Kavat-exclusive mod that allows the companion to emit a sonar wave that marks enemies on the mini map as well as making them glow with the energy of the Kavat for a short time.

name: Bullet Dance
description: Bullet Dance is a Stance mod for gunblades.

name: Wraith Twin Vipers
description: The Wraith Twin Vipers are the Wraith versions of the Twin Vipers that have higher damage and a slight boost to  Puncture damage, but lower  Slash with a higher critical chance.

name: Nekros Prime
description: Release Date: August 23rd, 2016. Nekros Prime is the Prime variant of the Nekros Warframe featuring higher shields and power values, as well as an additional  polarity.

name: Lith G1 Radiant
description: Void Relics are Orokin objects that can be opened to reveal valuable treasure enclosed within by completing Void Fissure missions. They are the principal means of acquiring Prime and Forma Blueprints.

name: Draining Gloom
description: Draining Gloom is PvP-exclusive Despair mod which causes Energy-draining explosions, but reduces Magazine Capacity and Reserve Ammo.

name: Prisma Shade
description: The Prisma Shade is the Shade Sentinel given the Prisma treatment, giving it modified stats over the original, and an included Prisma Burst Laser. This is the first sentinel to be given a Prisma counterpart.

name: Precision Munition
description: Precision Munition is PvP-exclusive Tonkor mod which increases its accuracy by 100%, flight speed by 50% but reduces magazine capacity by 50%.

name: Disarming Purity
description: Disarming Purity gives the Panthera's secondary fire mode a 40% chance to disarm enemies. It also adds a Purity effect.

name: Small Yogwun
description: This slow fish meanders through the waters and is often preyed upon by larger predators.

name: Helios Prime
description: Helios Prime is the Orokin-enhanced version of the Helios Sentinel and is equipped with Deconstructor Prime.

name: Gorgon Wraith
description: The Gorgon Wraith is the Wraith upgrade to the Gorgon, featuring a slight increase in damage, accuracy, and fire rate, while sacrificing  Puncture and  Slash damage. Compared to the Prisma Gorgon, it does slightly more damage per hit but has generally lower stats. It is a powerful Grineer light machine gun with a rapid fire rate and a huge magazine.

name: Hydroid Prime
description: Release Date: August 29th, 2017. Hydroid Prime is the primed variant of the Hydroid Warframe featuring more powerful stats: increased armor, energy and shield ratings, as well as an additional  and  polarity. It was released alongside Ballistica Prime and Nami Skyla Prime.

name: Corpus Void Key
description: Corpus Void Key is a special key only available during the Arid Fear Event. When used it will start a special Orokin Void mission taking place on a Corpus Ship. It serves no purpose beyond that event.

name: Chromatic Blade
description: Chromatic Blade is a Warframe Augment Mod for Excalibur  that increases Exalted Blade's Status Chance while changing its damage from Physical Damage to a certain primary Elemental Damage type depending on Excalibur's chosen energy color.

name: Oberon Prime
description: Release Date: May 30th, 2017. Oberon Prime is the primed variant of the Oberon Warframe featuring more powerful stats: 25 extra energy and 75 extra armor, as well as two additional  polarities, and a new particle effect on his Reckoning ability and his Hallowed Ground ability.

name: Vigilante Armaments
description: Vigilante Armaments is a set mod that increases Multishot for primary weapons.

name: Sybaris Prime
description: The Sybaris Prime is the Prime variant of the Sybaris burst-fire rifle. Released alongside Oberon Prime and Silva & Aegis Prime, it features the highest base damage of all the Sybaris variants and is geared towards inflicting Status Effects.

name: Ballistica Prime
description: The Ballistica Prime is the Prime variant of the Ballistica. It was released in Update 21.6 alongside Hydroid Prime and Nami Skyla Prime.

name: Marquise Veridos
description: May be traded for Ostron standing. May be refined into Marquise Veridos.

name: Piercing Navigator
description: Piercing Navigator is a Warframe Augment Mod for Ivara's Navigator that increases the projectile's crit chance by 10%, every successful hit, up to a max of 50%.

name: Smite Corrupted
description: Smite Corrupted increases the damage of melee weapons against Corrupted. The mod increases both the base damage and elemental damage of a weapon.

name: Gladiator Vice
description: Gladiator Vice is a set mod that increases the attack speed of a melee weapon.

name: Vigilante Pursuit
description: Vigilante Pursuit is a set mod that displays all enemies within its radius with red markers on the mini-map.

name: Augur Accord
description: Augur Accord is a set mod available from bounties on the Plains of Eidolon. It increases shield capacity by 180% at max rank, the full set bonus apllied converts 150% of energy spent with abilities into Shields.

name: Radian Sentirum
description: Radian Sentirum is a resource used to craft weapon parts.

name: Furax Wraith
description: The Furax Wraith is the Wraith variant of the Furax, featuring both improved critical statistics and channeling damage.

name: Beguiling Lantern
description: Beguiling Lantern is a Warframe Augment Mod for Titania that grants 100% bonus damage for all squadmates' melee attack against attracted enemies.

name: Expel Corrupted
description: Expel Corrupted increases the damage of secondary weapons against Corrupted. The mod increases both the base damage and elemental damage of a weapon.

name: Small Mortus Lungfish
description: Displays blood-splattered pattern on its scales and has its ribs exposed through open cavities along both flanks. When predators approach it lies still at the bottom of the sand banks, disguised as a carcass in hopes of being ignored.

name: Gladiator Aegis
description: Gladiator Aegis is a set mod that increases the armor of a Warframe.

name: Neutralizing Justice
description: Neutralizing Justice gives each Miter blade a chance to instantly destroy a Nullifier's bubble. It also adds a Justice effect.

name: Small Tralok
description: Strong, predatory fish with eyes that can pierce the darkest shadows.

name: Large Goopolla
description: A predatory fish that is attracted to the scent of blood.

name: Large Murkray
description: A cunning hunter that hides within the mud at the bottom of the lake and ambushes passing prey.

name: Vigilante Fervor
description: Vigilante Fervor is a set mod that increases Fire Rate for primary weapons.

name: Tear Azurite
description: Tear Azurite is a resource used to craft weapon parts. Each build yields 10x Tear Azurite.

name: Silva & Aegis Prime
description: The Silva & Aegis Prime are the Prime counterparts to the  Heat-based sword and shield combo weapons, Silva & Aegis.

name: Medium Mortus Lungfish
description: Displays blood-splattered pattern on its scales and has its ribs exposed through open cavities along both flanks. When predators approach it lies still at the bottom of the sand banks, disguised as a carcass in hopes of being ignored.

name: Shotgun Riven Mod (Veiled)
description: For Shotguns

name: Melee Riven Mod (Veiled)
description: For Melee weapons

name: Pistol Riven Mod (Veiled)
description: For Pistols

name: Spring-Loaded Blade
description: Spring-Loaded Blade is a melee mod that increases Melee Range by 30% for +24 secs on proccing a Status Effect.

name: Kinetic Diversion
description: Kinetic Diversion is an Archwing mod that converts +40% of Damage on Health to Energy.

name: Fateful Truth
description: Fateful Truth is a PvP exclusive Stance mod for Nikanas.

name: Magus Cadence
description: Magus Cadence is an Arcane Enhancement for the operator that grants a chance at increased sprint speed after a void dash.

name: Magus Vigor
description: Magus Vigor is an Arcane Enhancement for the Operator that grants them additional health upon transferring out of the Warframe.

name: Exodia Valor
description: Exodia Valor is an Arcane Enhancement for Zaws that grants a chance to increase channeling damage for a few seconds on Critical Hits.

name: Exodia Brave
description: Exodia Brave is an Arcane Enhancement for Zaws that increases energy rate on channeling kills.

name: Exodia Hunt
description: Exodia Hunt is an Arcane Enhancement for Zaws that grants a chance to pull in nearby enemies on slam attacks.

name: Exodia Triumph
description: Exodia Triumph is an Arcane Enhancement for Zaws that grants a chance to increase channeling damage for a few seconds on status procs.

name: Magus Nourish
description: Magus Nourish is an Arcane Enhancement for the Operator that restores health over time to the Warframe after transferring out of it.

name: Virtuos Shadow
description: Virtuos Shadow is an Arcane Enhancement for Operator Amps that grants a chance to increase Critical Chance on headshots.

name: Virtuos Fury
description: Virtuos Fury is an Arcane Enhancement for Operator Amps that grants a chance at increased damage after inflicting a Status Effect.

name: Virtuos Null
description: Virtuos Null is an Arcane Enhancement for Operator Amps that grants a chance to increase Amp and Void Beam energy regeneration on kills.

name: Virtuos Tempo
description: Virtuos Tempo is an Arcane Enhancement for Operator Amps that grants a chance to increase Fire Rate on kills.

name: Exodia Force
description: Exodia Force is an Arcane Enhancement for Zaw's that grants a chance to cause a radial blast around the player, inflicting a percentage of weapon damage to targets within range when inflicting a Status Effect.

name: Virtuos Ghost
description: Virtuos Ghost is an Arcane Enhancement for Operator Amps that grants a chance to increase status chance on headshots.

name: Ankyros Prime
description: The Ankyros Prime are the primed version of Ankyros, added in Update 12.4.

name: Bo Prime
description: The Bo Prime is the primed variant of the Bo staff. It was added in Update 13.7, featuring higher damage and an additional  polarity.

name: Fang Prime
description: Fang Prime features a higher base damage than Fang as well as a faster attack speed. The Fang Prime was added into the game in Update 9.0.

name: Latron Prime
description: The Latron Prime is an ancient Orokin semi-automatic rifle that serves as an upgrade to the Latron, that features higher base damage in the form of more  Puncture damage and critical chance.

name: Orthos Prime
description: The Orthos Prime features a higher base damage, range, and attack speed than the Orthos. The Orthos Prime was added into the game in Update 9.

name: Nyx Prime
description: Release Date: September 23rd, 2014. Nyx Prime is the primed variant of the Nyx Warframe featuring more powerful stats: possessing higher armor, sprint speed and shield capacity, as well as an additional  polarity.

name: Rhino Prime
description: Release Date: March 5th, 2014. Rhino Prime is the primed variant of the Rhino Warframe featuring more powerful stats: possessing higher armor and sprint speed, as well as an additional  polarity.

name: Frost Prime
description: Release Date: May 3rd, 2013. Frost Prime is the primed variant of the Frost Warframe featuring more powerful stats, possessing higher shield capacity as well as an additional  polarity.

name: Malignant Force
description: The Malignant Force mod increases both the  Toxin damage and Status Chance of a rifle by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

name: Eroding Blight
description: The Eroding Blight mod is a Weapon Augment Mod that increases magazine capacity and Blight specifically for the Embolist. It increases magazine capacity by 50% and Blight by 0.25 per rank, at a maximum of 200% and 1 at rank 3, respectively.

name: Energy Inversion
description: The Energy Inversion mod increases the Shield Capacity of an Archwing by 30% per rank at a maximum of 120% at rank 3.

name: Shattering Justice
description: The Shattering Justice mod is a Weapon Augment Mod that adds status chance and Justice specifically for the Sobek. It increases status chance by 5 and Justice by 0.25 per rank, at a maximum of 20 and 1 at rank 3, respectively.

name: Vicious Frost
description: The Vicious Frost mod increases both the  Cold damage and Status Chance of a melee weapon by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

name: Jagged Edge
description: Jagged Edge increase the  Slash damage of a melee weapon by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at rank 5.

name: Dead Eye
description: Dead Eye is an Aura that increases the damage dealt with sniper rifles by 8.75% per rank, up to 35% at maximum.

name: Shield Disruption
description: Shield Disruption is an Aura that reduces the shield capacity of all enemies.

name: Corrosive Projection
description: Corrosive Projection is an aura that reduces armor for all enemies in a mission.

name: Heavy Trauma
description: Heavy Trauma increases the  Impact damage of melee weapons.

name: Power Throw
description: Power Throw adds Punch Through distance to the charge attacks of Glaive weapons.

name: Overextended
description: Overextended increases Power Range while reducing Power Strength of Warframe abilities.

name: Superior Defenses
description: The Superior Defenses mod increases the Shield Recharge Rate of an Archwing by 25% per rank at a maximum of 100% at rank 3.

name: Cutting Edge
description: The Cutting Edge mod increases melee damage of an Archwing melee weapon by 10% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 5.

name: Contagious Spread
description: Contagious Spread increases the  Toxin damage on a Shotgun Weapon.

name: Vile Acceleration
description: Vile Acceleration is a Corrupted Mod for rifles and Bows that increases their Fire Rate by 15% per rank to 90% at rank 5 but decreases damage by -2.5% per rank to -15% at rank 5. The increase in fire rate is doubled for bows.

name: Diamond Skin
description: Diamond Skin increases the  Radiation damage resistance of a Warframe's shield and health.

name: Bite
description: Bite mod increases Kubrow and Kavat Critical Chance & Critical Damage.

name: Shotgun Savvy
description: Shotgun Savvy increases Shotgun Status Chance.

name: Redirection
description: Redirection increases the Maximum Shield Capacity of a Warframe. It is the first normal Mod that all new players receive in Warframe, where it is automatically given upon activating the Liset's Mods console.

name: Swift Deth
description: Swift Deth mod allows Dethcube to attack the first visible enemy in range.

name: Toxic Sequence
description: The Toxic Sequence mod is a Weapon Augment Mod that increases status duration and Sequence specifically for the Acrid. It increases status duration by 50% and Sequence by 0.25 per rank, at a maximum of 200% and 1 at rank 3, respectively.

name: Volcanic Edge
description: The Volcanic Edge mod increases both the  Heat damage and Status Chance of a melee weapon by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

name: Point Strike
description: The Point Strike mod increases a primary weapon's critical chance by 25% per rank for a maximum of 150% at rank 5.

name: Vigor
description: The Vigor mod increases both Shield Capacity and Health attributes of a Warframe by a percentage of their base values.

name: Seeker
description: The Seeker mod increases Punch Through of a pistol by 0.35 per rank for a maximum of 2.1 at rank 5.

name: Streamline
description: The Streamline mod increases the Power Efficiency of Warframe abilities.

name: Polar Magazine
description: The Polar Magazine mod adds  Cold damage on Archwing guns by 20% per rank at a maximum of 120% at rank 5.

name: Rifle Amp
description: Rifle Amp is an Aura that increases the damage dealt with rifles.

name: No Return
description: No Return increases the  Puncture damage of a pistol.

name: Vicious Spread
description: Vicious Spread increases the damage and spread of shotguns by 15% and 10% per rank to a maximum of 90% and 60% at Rank 5, respectively.

name: Enemy Sense
description: Enemy Sense displays all enemies within its radius with red markers on the mini-map. This includes Latchers thrown by Grineer Seekers and Maggots spawned by Brood Mothers, but does not include cameras and turrets present in Corpus missions.

name: Protect
description: Protect mod allows Raksa Kubrow to come to the defense of its master, replenishing both their shields and its own.

name: Gilded Truth
description: The Gilded Truth mod is a Weapon Augment Mod that increases Fire Rate and Truth specifically for the Burston Prime. It increases fire rate by 20% and Truth by 0.25 per rank, at a maximum of 80% and 1 at rank 3, respectively.

name: Fast Hands
description: The Fast Hands mod increases reload speed by 5% per rank for a maximum of 30% at rank 5.

name: Deadly Sequence
description: The Deadly Sequence mod is a Weapon Augment Mod that increases critical chance and Sequence specifically for the Grinlok. It increases critical chance by 50% and Sequence by 0.25 per rank, at a maximum of 200% and 1 at rank 3, respectively.

name: Spare Parts
description: Spare Parts gives the Sentinel a chance to drop rare items on death.

name: Vaporize
description: Vaporize allows Dethcube to periodically fire a powerful beam weapon at nearby foes.

name: Fever Strike
description: Fever Strike increases  Toxin damage on a Melee Weapon.

name: Sawtooth Clip
description: Sawtooth Clip Increases the  Slash damage of Rifles. Not to be confused with Serration which increases all damage types at once.

name: Link Armor
description: Link Armor is a Companion mod that allows the owner to share their armor as an addition to the Companion's armor.

name: Bleeding Willow
description: Bleeding Willow is a Stance Mod for polearm weapons, specializing in lunging, sweeping attacks that can hit large swathes of enemies.

name: Undying Will
description: Undying Will increases the Warframe's bleedout timer.

name: Pointed Wind
description: Pointed Wind is a Stance mod for daggers that specializes in high damage, sweeping slashes and jumping strikes.

name: Rifle Scavenger
description: Rifle Scavenger is an Aura that increases the amount of rifle ammo recovered per drop.

name: Rubedo-Lined Barrel
description: The Rubedo-Lined Barrel mod increases the damage of an Archwing gun by 10% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 5.

name: Rupture
description: Rupture increases the  Impact damage of Rifles.

name: Crossing Snakes
description: Crossing Snakes is one of two Stance mods for Dual Sword type weapons. Wielders of this Stance thrust at foes with deadly jabs.

name: Rejuvenation
description: Rejuvenation is an Aura that regenerates all team members' health every second.

name: Shredder
description: Shredder increases  Slash Damage for Shotgun by 5% to a maximum of 30%.

name: Malicious Raptor
description: Malicious Raptor is a rare Stance mod for Claw-type weapons.

name: Hollow Point
description: Hollow Point increases critical hit damage while reducing the damage of Pistols.

name: Insulation
description: Insulation increases the Cold damage resistance of a Warframe's health and shields.

name: Bright Purity
description: The Bright Purity mod is a Weapon Augment Mod that increases melee damage and Purity specifically for the Skana, Prisma Skana and Skana Prime. It increases melee damage by 25% and Purity by 0.25 per rank, at a maximum of 100% and 1 at rank 3, respectively.

name: Tactical Pump
description: The Tactical Pump mod increases reload speed of a shotgun by 5% per rank for a maximum of 30% at rank 5.

name: Investigator
description: Investigator allows the Helios Sentinel to scan objects and enemies it encounters. This consumes Codex Scanner, or Synthesis Scanner charges.

name: Smite Infested
description: The Smite Infested mod increases the damage of melee weapons against Infested by 5% per rank for a maximum of 30% at rank 5.

name: Molten Impact
description: The Molten Impact increases  Heat damage on a melee weapon by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at rank 5.

name: Expel Grineer
description: Expel Grineer increases the damage of secondary weapons against Grineer.

name: Sequence Burn
description: The Sequence Burn mod is a Weapon Augment Mod that increases weapon range and Sequence specifically for the Spectra. It increases the range by 5 and Sequence by 0.25 per rank, at a maximum of 20 and 1 at rank 3, respectively.

name: Frigid Blast
description: The Frigid Blast mod increases both the  Cold damage and Status Chance of a shotgun by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

name: Rending Strike
description: The Rending Strike mod adds an additional 20%  Puncture per rank and 15%  Slash per rank for a maximum of 80% and 60% at rank 3, respectively.

name: Ammo Stock
description: The Ammo Stock mod increases shotgun magazine capacity by 10% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 5.

name: Self Destruct
description: Self Destruct allows Sentinels to explode upon death, dealing Explosion Damage in a moderate AoE.

name: Accelerated Blast
description: The Accelerated Blast mod increases the fire rate of Shotguns by 15% and  Puncture damage by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3 for both values.

name: Acrobat
description: Acrobat reduces the stamina cost of wallrunning.

name: Coolant Leak
description: Coolant Leak allows a Sentinel to freeze and slow all enemies at close proximity in a similar manner to Freeze Damage.

name: Tainted Shell
description: The Tainted Shell mod reduces the spread of Shotgun fire by -7% per rank while also decreasing the fire rate by -5% per rank for a maximum of reduced spread by -77% and reduced fire rate by -55% at rank 10.

name: Stinging Truth
description: The Stinging Truth mod is a Weapon Augment Mod that increases magazine capacity and Truth specifically for the Viper. It increases magazine capacity by 10 and Truth by 0.25 per rank, at a maximum of 40 and 1 at rank 3, respectively.

name: Killing Blow
description: Killing Blow increases the channeling damage of a melee weapon by 20% per rank, at a maximum of 120% at rank 5.

name: Sure Footed
description: Sure Footed increases a Warframe's chance to resist knockdown.

name: Iron Phoenix
description: Iron Phoenix is a Stance mod for longswords, that provide very mobile combos that allows users to move semi-freely.

name: Stabilizer
description: The Stabilizer mod is a rifle mod that reduces the recoil produced from firing a weapon by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at Rank 3.

name: Quickening
description: Quickening increases the attack speed of melee weapons while channeling at the cost of reduced channeling efficiency.

name: Sundering Strike
description: Sundering Strike increases  Puncture damage on a melee weapon.

name: Gemini Cross
description: Gemini Cross is a Stance mod for Tonfa-type weapons.

name: Stormbringer
description: The Stormbringer mod adds  Electricity damage to a weapon by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at Rank 5.

name: Dig
description: The Dig mod allows the Sahasa Kubrow to dig up items upon the battlefield. They will be able to dig up random ammunition types, health orbs, energy orbs, small amounts of credits, and occasionally mods.

name: Shotgun Spazz
description: The Shotgun Spazz mod increases fire rate of a shotgun by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at rank 5.

name: Charged Chamber
description: Not to be confused with Primed Chamber.

name: Continuous Misery
description: Continuous Misery increases the duration of Status Effects inflicted by rifles.

name: Thermite Rounds
description: The Thermite Rounds mod increases both the  Heat damage and Status Chance of a rifle by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at Rank 3.

name: Telos Akbolto
description: The Telos Akbolto is an exclusive version of the Akbolto available only from the Arbiters of Hexis. Featuring improved stats, the Telos Akbolto also features innate Truth effect.

name: Sancti Castanas
description: The Sancti Castanas are an exclusive version of the Castanas available only from New Loka. It has higher base damage, status and critical chance as well as innate Purity effect.

name: Ancient Fusion Core
description: Ancient Core is an exclusive, special type of Fusion Core that was distributed during the transition from Mods 1.0 to Mods 2.0.

name: Legendary Fusion Core
description: The Legendary Core is an exclusive, special type of resource appearing as an ornate gold orb, which can be used to maximize any mods without Endo and Credit costs.

name: Primed Ravage
description: Primed Ravage increases the Critical Damage of a shotgun and is a direct upgrade to the Ravage mod.

name: Primed Point Blank
description: Primed Point Blank is the Primed version of the Point Blank mod that increases a shotgun's base damage.

name: Prisma Gorgon
description: The Prisma Gorgon is a variant of the Gorgon light machine gun that features a unique Prisma skin and modified stats, which dependent on current trades, can be temporarily available from the Void Trader, Baro Ki'Teer. Like its predecessor, the Prisma Gorgon sports a sizable magazine size with a high rate of fire, offset by the spooling time and long reload time. Notably, the Prisma Gorgon grants higher magazine and ammo reserve values along with its other boosted stats over its predecessor.

name: High Noon
description: High Noon is a Stance mod for gunblades, blending swift slashes with gunshots.

name: Primed Pistol Mutation
description: Primed Pistol Mutation is the Primed version of the Pistol Ammo Mutation mod for pistols, which converts any unused ammo type into Pistol Ammo, or Sniper Ammo in the case of most explosive sidearms. The affected pistol will only convert ammo while equipped, and will not convert any ammo type used by holstered primary weapons until their own ammo is full.

name: Prisma Veritux
description: The Prisma Veritux is the Veritux sword for the Archwing with enhanced stats and a unique Prisma skin.

name: Resonance
description: Resonance is a Warframe Augment Mod for Banshee's Sonar that triggers an additional Sonar pulse with a fraction of the original pulse's remaining duration if an enemy is killed in a highlighted weakspot.

name: Total Eclipse
description: Total Eclipse is a Mirage Warframe Augment Mod for Eclipse that allows it to grant its bonuses to nearby allies.

name: Tidal Impunity
description: Tidal Impunity is a Hydroid Warframe Augment Mod for Tidal Surge that allows Hydroid and all allies contacted by the ability to temporarily gain immunity to Status Effects, as well as removing already active ones.

name: Ballistic Bullseye
description: Ballistic Bullseye is a Warframe Augment Mod for Mesa that gives shots enhanced by Ballistic Battery a chance to deal Status Effects.

name: Repelling Bastille
description: Repelling Bastille is a Warframe Augment Mod for Vauban's Bastille that repels new enemies when it reaches the maximum amount of enemies it can contain.

name: Mind Freak
description: Mind Freak is a Warframe Augment Mod for Nyx that makes enemies under the effects of Mind Control deal additional attack damage.

name: Swing Line
description: Swing Line is a Warframe Augment Mod for Valkyr that enables the ability to, after an initial cast of Rip Line, grant successive uses of Rip Line without using energy if cast while airborne.

name: Abating Link
description: Abating Link is a Warframe Augment Mod for Trinity's Link that reduces the armor of all connected enemies.

name: Hallowed Eruption
description: Hallowed Eruption is a Warframe Augment Mod for Oberon. Upon casting Hallowed Ground again with a previous instance still active, the first one will detonate, dealing all remaining damage as an AoE blast with a chance to deal  Radiation proc.

name: Iron Shrapnel
description: Iron Shrapnel is a Warframe Augment Mod usable in both PvE and PvP for Rhino's Iron Skin that when active allows it to be detonated by pressing the ability key (default 2), unleashing a radial AoE attack that deals a portion of its remaining health as  Puncture damage.

name: Arcane Agility
description: Arcane Agility is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance whenever the player receives damage to increase Warframe sprint speed for a short time.

name: Arcane Eruption
description: Arcane Eruption is an Arcane Enhancement  that provides a chance whenever an energy orb is picked up to knock down nearby enemies.

name: Arcane Trickery
description: Arcane Trickery is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance on performing a melee finisher to grant the Warframe invisibility for a short time.

name: Volt Prime
description: Release Date: March 24th, 2015. Volt Prime is the primed variant of the Volt Warframe featuring more powerful stats: possessing a higher energy capacity and armor, as well as an additional  polarity.

name: Explosive Legerdemain
description: Explosive Legerdemain is a Warframe Augment Mod for Mirage that causes Sleight Of Hand to turn all eligible Pickups into proximity mines ready to detonate.

name: Escape Velocity
description: Escape Velocity is a Nova Warframe Augment Mod for Worm Hole that grants Nova and her allies increased movement speed after teleporting.

name: Vampire Leech
description: Vampire Leech is a Warframe Augment Mod for Trinity that causes Energy Vampire to convert excess energy into replenishing Shields, and will even boost into Overshields.

name: Piercing Caliber
description: The Piercing Caliber mod increases  Puncture damage of a rifle by 20% per rank for a maximum of 120% at Rank 5.

name: Tempo Royale
description: Tempo Royale is a Stance Mod for Heavy Blades, specializing in fast, mobile and smooth spinning attacks. This stance sports more graceful maneuvers than its companion stances, utilizing flips and overhead slashes to attain mobility, ultimately providing opportunities to finish enemies with devastating attacks.

name: Capacitance
description: Capacitance is a Warframe Augment Mod for Volt that converts a percentage of damage dealt by Discharge into shields, split between himself and allies.

name: Piercing Roar
description: Piercing Roar is a Warframe Augment Mod for Rhino  that gives Roar the ability to inflict  Puncture procs on enemies.

name: Hushed Invisibility
description: Hushed Invisibility is a Warframe Augment Mod for Loki's Invisibility that allows it to reduce the noise level of weapons fired.

name: Pilfering Swarm
description: Pilfering Swarm is a Hydroid Warframe Augment Mod that grants Tentacle Swarm a chance to yield additional loot from enemies killed while they're ensnared by the tentacles.

name: Afterburn
description: Afterburn is a Warframe Augment Mod usable in both PvE and PvP for Chroma's Spectral Scream that launches a single damaging elemental attack upon deactivating the ability.

name: Rising Storm
description: Rising Storm is an Ash Warframe Augment Mod that increases the duration of the Melee Combo Counter when Blade Storm is used.

name: Chilling Globe
description: Chilling Globe is a Warframe Augment Mod for Frost that gives Snow Globe a chance to temporarily freeze enemies solid that enter its range.

name: Firequake
description: Firequake is a Warframe Augment Mod for Ember that gives World On Fire a chance to down enemies caught in the flames.

name: Odonata Prime
description: Release Date: March 24th, 2015. Comparisons:

name: Pummel
description: The Pummel mod increases  Impact damage of a pistol by 20% per rank for a maximum of 120% at rank 5.

name: Perpetual Agony
description: Perpetual Agony increases the duration of Status Effects inflicted by secondary weapons.

name: Crash Course
description: The Crash Course mod increases  Impact damage of rifles by 20% per rank for a maximum of 120% at rank 5.

name: Shield of Shadows
description: Shield of Shadows is a Warframe Augment Mod that allows Nekros to transfer a percentage of damage he receives to any active Shadows of the Dead minions within 50 meters.

name: Enduring Strike
description: Enduring Strike increases the status chance of melee weapons while Channeling at the cost of reduced channeling efficiency.

name: Singularity
description: Singularity is a Warframe Augment Mod for Nyx's Absorb in PvP that creates a ring every three seconds to drag in enemies close enough to Singularity's radius.

name: Purging Slash
description: Purging Slash is a Warframe Augment Mod for Excalibur's Slash Dash in PvP that removes allies' debuffs and restores their shields when Slash Dashed into.

name: Breach Loader
description: The Breach Loader mod increases  Puncture damage of a shotgun by 20% per rank for a maximum of 120% at Rank 5.

name: Bore
description: The Bore mod increases  Puncture damage of a pistol by 20% per rank for a maximum of 120% at Rank 5.

name: Signal Flare
description: Signal Flare is a PvP Warframe Augment Mod for Excalibur's Radial Blind in that marks enemies who are blinded on the mini-map temporarily.

name: Kinetic Collision
description: Kinetic Collision is a Warframe Augment Mod for Volt's Speed in PvP that increases Speed's duration when the player makes contact with an opponent.

name: Funnel Clouds
description: Funnel Clouds is a Warframe Augment Mod for Zephyr that increases the number of active Tornadoes while decreasing their size and removes their ability to pick up enemies.

name: Auger Strike
description: The Auger Strike mod increases  Puncture damage of a melee weapon by 20% per rank for a maximum of 120% at rank 5.

name: Lethal Momentum
description: Lethal Momentum increases flight speed of Pistol rounds.

name: Ash Prime
description: Release Date: July 7, 2015. Ash Prime is the primed variant of the Ash Warframe featuring more powerful stats, possessing a higher shield capacity, armor and sprint speed, as well as an additional  polarity.

name: Carrier Prime
description: The Primed version of the Carrier Sentinel, the Carrier Prime features increased health and armor, and comes with the enhanced Sweeper Prime weapon.

name: Vectis Prime
description: The Vectis Prime is the prime version of the Vectis sniper rifle. Featuring higher base damage and a doubled magazine, the Vectis Prime retains the standard version's 4x zoom setting, but swaps the Vectis' 3x zoom for a much higher 10x zoom, allowing for both medium and long range combat.

name: Armored Agility
description: Armored Agility increases the Sprint Speed and armor of Warframes.

name: Prisma Grakata
description: The Prisma Grakata is a Void Trader-exclusive variant of the Grakata assault rifle featuring a unique Prisma finish and enhanced stats.

name: Arcane Deflection
description: Arcane Deflection is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance to resist a  Slash damage effect entirely.

name: Arcane Resistance
description: Arcane Resistance is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance to resist an  Electric damage effect entirely.

name: Vermilion Storm
description: Vermilion Storm is a Rare Stance mod for Claw weapons.

name: Mobilize
description: Mobilize increases Bullet Jump speed and the duration of Aim Glide and Wall Latch.

name: Firewalker
description: The Firewalker Mod increases the speed of Bullet Jump, lengthens the duration of Aim Glide and Wall Latching, and adds  Heat damage to Bullet Jump.

name: Lightning Dash
description: The Lightning Dash mod increases the speed of Bullet Jump, lengthens the duration of Aim Glide and Wall Latching, and adds  Electric damage to Bullet Jump.

name: Ice Spring
description: The Ice Spring mod increases the speed of Bullet Jump, lengthens the duration of Aim Glide and Wall Latching, and adds  Cold damage to Bullet Jump.

name: Toxic Flight
description: The Toxic Flight mod increases the speed of Bullet Jump, lengthens the duration of Aim Glide and Wall Latching, and adds  Toxin damage to Bullet Jump.

name: Battering Maneuver
description: The Battering Maneuver mod increases the speed of Bullet Jump, lengthens the duration of Aim Glide and Wall Latching, and adds  Impact damage to Bullet Jump.

name: Rending Turn
description: The Rending Turn mod increases the speed of Bullet Jump, lengthens the duration of Aim Glide and Wall Latching, and adds  Slash damage to Bullet Jump.

name: Piercing Step
description: The Piercing Step mod increases the speed of Bullet Jump, lengthens the duration of Aim Glide and Wall Latching, and adds  Puncture damage to Bullet Jump.

name: Seismic Wave
description: The Seismic Wave mod increases the ground slam damage of melee weapons.

name: Adhesive Blast
description: Adhesive Blast allows weapon-fired grenades to stick to surfaces.

name: Concealed Explosives
description: Concealed Explosives is a mod gives certain thrown secondary weapons a chance of exploding on impact of a surface or an enemy.

name: Depleted Reload
description: Depleted Reload is a Corrupted sniper rifle mod that decreases magazine capacity and increases reload speed.

name: Dual Kamas Prime
description: The Dual Kamas Prime are the Primed versions of the Dual Kamas, featuring higher damage as well as improvements to most stats.

name: Gaia's Tragedy
description: Gaia's Tragedy is one of three Stance mods for Fist type weapons.

name: Primed Shotgun Ammo Mutation
description: Primed Shotgun Ammo Mutation is the Primed version of the Shotgun Ammo Mutation mod for shotguns, which converts any unused ammo type into Shotgun Ammo. The affected shotgun will only convert ammo while equipped, and will not convert any ammo type used by holstered secondary weapons until their own ammo is full.

name: Arcane Tempo
description: Arcane Tempo is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance whenever the player upon achieving a critical Hit to increase Fire Rate on Shotguns for a short time.

name: Arcane Velocity
description: Arcane Velocity is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance whenever the player upon achieving a critical Hit to increase Fire Rate on Secondaries for a short time.

name: Dera Vandal
description: The Dera Vandal is the Vandal version of the Dera assault rifle, offered as a possible reward to players who participated in the Operation: Tubemen of Regor Event, had Nef Anyo been victorious on PC or XB1. Its blueprint and components can also occur as Invasion rewards.

name: Karak Wraith
description: The Karak Wraith is the Wraith variant of the Karak assault rifle, offered as a reward for players who participated in the Operation: Tubemen of Regor Event with Alad V victorious. Its blueprint and components can also occur as Invasion rewards.

name: Madurai Lens
description: Focus Abilities can be upgraded through the use of Focus Points, which are earned through the use of a Focus Lens, a special item that converts 1.25% of Affinity earned to Focus Points, before allocating the points to either Warframe only, or split between Warframe and weapon when using a weapon. Focus Lenses can only be installed on Rank 30 Warframes, Weapons, Archwings, and Archwing weapons. Only excess experience points gained after Rank 30 is converted to Focus points; if a Focus Lens-equipped item is polarized, the item will not convert Focus points until it has once again reached Rank 30. Items can only have one Focus Lens installed at any time; while players can install another Focus Lens over the old one, the previously installed Lens will be lost in the process.

name: Zenurik Lens
description: Focus Abilities can be upgraded through the use of Focus Points, which are earned through the use of a Focus Lens, a special item that converts 1.25% of Affinity earned to Focus Points, before allocating the points to either Warframe only, or split between Warframe and weapon when using a weapon. Focus Lenses can only be installed on Rank 30 Warframes, Weapons, Archwings, and Archwing weapons. Only excess experience points gained after Rank 30 is converted to Focus points; if a Focus Lens-equipped item is polarized, the item will not convert Focus points until it has once again reached Rank 30. Items can only have one Focus Lens installed at any time; while players can install another Focus Lens over the old one, the previously installed Lens will be lost in the process.

name: Naramon Lens
description: Focus Abilities can be upgraded through the use of Focus Points, which are earned through the use of a Focus Lens, a special item that converts 1.25% of Affinity earned to Focus Points, before allocating the points to either Warframe only, or split between Warframe and weapon when using a weapon. Focus Lenses can only be installed on Rank 30 Warframes, Weapons, Archwings, and Archwing weapons. Only excess experience points gained after Rank 30 is converted to Focus points; if a Focus Lens-equipped item is polarized, the item will not convert Focus points until it has once again reached Rank 30. Items can only have one Focus Lens installed at any time; while players can install another Focus Lens over the old one, the previously installed Lens will be lost in the process.

name: Unairu Lens
description: Focus Abilities can be upgraded through the use of Focus Points, which are earned through the use of a Focus Lens, a special item that converts 1.25% of Affinity earned to Focus Points, before allocating the points to either Warframe only, or split between Warframe and weapon when using a weapon. Focus Lenses can only be installed on Rank 30 Warframes, Weapons, Archwings, and Archwing weapons. Only excess experience points gained after Rank 30 is converted to Focus points; if a Focus Lens-equipped item is polarized, the item will not convert Focus points until it has once again reached Rank 30. Items can only have one Focus Lens installed at any time; while players can install another Focus Lens over the old one, the previously installed Lens will be lost in the process.

name: Agility Drift
description: Agility Drift is a rare dual-stat Exilus mod that reduces damage taken while airborne and reduces enemy accuracy when targeting the player.[1]

name: Coaction Drift
description: Coaction Drift is a rare dual-stat Exilus mod that increases an Aura's strength and effectiveness.

name: Cunning Drift
description: Cunning Drift is a rare triple-stat Exilus mod that increases slide, reduces friction and increases Power Range.

name: Endurance Drift
description: Endurance Drift is a rare dual-stat Exilus mod that increases Maximum Energy and parkour velocity.

name: Power Drift
description: Power Drift is a rare dual-stat Exilus mod that increases Power Strength and grants a chance to resist knockdown.

name: Speed Drift
description: Speed Drift is a rare dual-stat Exilus mod that increases sprint speed and casting speed.

name: Stealth Drift
description: Stealth Drift is a rare dual-stat Exilus mod that increases enemy detection on the minimap and Aim Glide and Wall Latch time.

name: Akbronco Prime
description: The Akbronco Prime lowers  Impact damage to increase  Slash damage, while gaining increased firing rate, critical damage, status chance and magazine size. The Akbronco Prime was added into the game in Update 12.4.

name: Dakra Prime
description: The Dakra Prime is a standalone prime melee weapon which was added to the game in Update 10.0.

name: Mag Prime
description: Release Date: September 13th, 2013. Mag Prime is the primed variant of the Mag Warframe featuring more powerful stats: possessing increased health, as well as an additional  polarity.

name: Measured Burst
description: Measured Burst is PvP-exclusive Tiberon mod which increases damage and decrease Fire Rate when aiming.

name: Secondary Wind
description: Secondary Wind is PvP-exclusive Pistol Mod which increases Health Regen on Kills.

name: Soaring Strike
description: Soaring Strike is PvP-exclusive Bow Mod which increases Fire Rate while airborne.

name: Sudden Justice
description: Sudden Justice is PvP-exclusive Sybaris mod which increases Fire Rate when 2 Hits are made within 0.2 seconds.

name: Tactical Retreat
description: Tactical Retreat is a PvP-exclusive Warframe mod which increases mobility at low health.

name: Triple Tap
description: Triple Tap is PvP-exclusive Burston mod which increases Damage on 2 Hits within 0.2 seconds.

name: Vital Systems Bypass
description: Vital Systems Bypass is a PvP-exclusive Warframe mod that gives the Warframe constant health regeneration but lengthens the delay before their shield recharges after being damaged.

name: Primed Bane of Infested
description: Primed Bane of Infested is the Primed version of the Bane of Infested mod, which increases the damage of rifles against Infested. The mod increases both the base damage and elemental damage of a weapon.

name: Primed Bane of Corpus
description: Primed Bane of Corpus is the Primed version of the Bane of Corpus mod, which increases the damage of rifles against Corpus. The mod increases both the base damage and elemental damage of a weapon.

name: Vulpine Mask
description: Vulpine Mask is a Stance Mod for Rapier type weapons.

name: Primed Bane of Grineer
description: Primed Bane of Grineer is the Primed version of the Bane of Grineer mod, which increases the damage of rifles against Grineer. The mod increases both the base damage and elemental damage of a weapon.

name: Blood Rush
description: Blood Rush is an uncommon Melee mod that increases Critical chance as the Melee Combo Counter increases.

name: Body Count
description: Body Count is a common Melee mod that extends the duration of the Melee Combo Counter.

name: Weeping Wounds
description: Weeping Wounds is an uncommon Melee mod that increases Status chance as the Melee Combo Multiplier increases.

name: Maiming Strike
description: Maiming Strike is a rare Melee mod that increases the chance of a Critical Hit on slide attacks.

name: Hydraulic Crosshairs
description: Hydraulic Crosshairs is a common Pistol mod that increases Critical chance while aiming for a brief time upon a headshot.

name: Laser Sight
description: Laser Sight is an uncommon Shotgun mod that increases Critical chance while aiming for a brief time upon a headshot.

name: Bladed Rounds
description: Bladed Rounds is an uncommon Rifle mod that increases Critical damage while aiming for a brief time upon a kill.

name: Shrapnel Shot
description: Shrapnel Shot is a common Shotgun mod that increases Critical damage while aiming for a brief time upon a kill.

name: Pressurized Magazine
description: Pressurized Magazine is a rare Pistol mod that increases Fire Rate while aiming for a brief time upon reloading.

name: Reaper Prime
description: The Reaper Prime is a standalone prime melee Scythe, added to the game in Update 8, along with the Frost Prime Warframe, and the Latron Prime.

name: Spring-Loaded Chamber
description: Spring-Loaded Chamber is an uncommon Assault Rifle mod that increases Fire Rate while aiming for a brief time upon reloading.

name: Repeater Clip
description: Repeater Clip is an uncommon Shotgun mod that increases Fire Rate while aiming for a brief time upon reloading.

name: Soma Prime
description: The Soma Prime is the primed version of the Soma assault rifle. It primarily features a greater magazine size, greater ammo reserves, and a slight increase to physical damage and status chance.

name: Embedded Catalyzer
description: Embedded Catalyzer is an uncommon Pistol mod that increases Status chance while aiming for a brief time after casting an ability.

name: Saryn Prime
description: Release Date: February 16th, 2016. Saryn Prime is the primed variant of the Saryn Warframe featuring higher armor, sprint speed, and power values, as well as an additional  polarity.

name: Nova Prime
description: Release Date: December 16, 2014. Nova Prime is the primed variant of the Nova Warframe featuring more powerful stats: possessing a higher energy capacity and shield capacity, as well as an additional  polarity.

name: Antimatter Mine
description: Antimatter Mine is a Warframe Augment Mod for Nova's Antimatter Drop in PvP which creates a fully charged stationary orb, that either explodes after 6 seconds or on enemy proximity.

name: Prism Guard
description: Prism Guard is a Warframe Augment Mod for Mirage's Prism in PvP that causes the prism to follow above her.

name: Deceptive Bond
description: Deceptive Bond is a Warframe Augment Mod for Loki's Decoy in PvP that redirects damage dealt to Loki to the decoy, and vice versa.

name: Discharge Strike
description: Discharge Strike is a Warframe Augment Mod for Nekros's Soul Punch in PvP that depletes energy from an opponent.

name: Ward Recovery
description: Ward Recovery is a Warframe Augment Mod for Nezha's Warding Halo in PvP that recovers some of the energy used to cast it, based on how much protection is left.

name: Power of Three
description: Power of Three is a Warframe Augment Mod for Ivara's Quiver in PvP that fires three additional arrows but consumes extra energy.

name: Anti-Flak Plating
description: Anti-Flak Plating is PvP-exclusive Warframe mod which grants resistance to  Blast damage but reduces Mobility.

name: Skull Shots (Viper)
description: Skull Shots is PvP-exclusive Viper mod which increases Ammo Efficiency for 1 second, on Headshot.

name: Brain Storm (Grakata)
description: Brain Storm is PvP-exclusive Grakata mod that increases Ammo Efficiency for 0.5 second on headshot.

name: Ambush Optics (Rubico)
description: Ambush Optics is PvP-exclusive Rubico mod that decreases zoom.

name: Shrapnel Rounds (Marelok)
description: Shrapnel Rounds is PvP-exclusive Marelok mod which increases Multishot for reduced Damage.

name: Thundermiter (Miter)
description: Thundermiter is PvP-exclusive Miter mod which lets charged Projectiles explode but reduces Fire Rate.

name: Static Alacrity (Staticor)
description: Static Alacrity is PvP-exclusive Staticor mod which increases Flight Speed but reduces Explosion Radius.

name: Emergent Aftermath
description: Emergent Aftermath is PvP-exclusive Sniper Rifle mod which temporarily increases Reload Speed for 3 seconds upon a kill.

name: Energy Conversion
description: Energy Conversion is a Warframe mod that increases Power Strength for the next ability cast after picking up an energy orb.

name: Broken War
description: Broken War is a sword formed from a portion of the War greatsword, the weapon given to Stalker by the Sentient Hunhow. This weapon is granted as a reward for completing The Second Dream Quest.

name: Snipetron Vandal
description: The Snipetron Vandal is the Vandal version of the Snipetron, first awarded as a special-edition reward for killing 20 Informers in the Informant Event and can be found as a Sortie Reward. The Snipetron Vandal has better characteristics than the regular Snipetron in magazine size and reload speed, but sacrifices  Impact and  Slash damages in order to boost its  Puncture damage.

name: Hollowed Bullets
description: Hollowed Bullets increases the critical damage multiplier for Archwing guns by 15% per rank at a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

name: Xiphos
description: The Xiphos is a Landing Craft, which can serve as an alternative transportation choice to the Liset. If the Xiphos is the selected Landing Craft, using an Air Support Charge will have Ordis deploy a sentry gun. The Xiphos landed in Update 18.5.

name: Bleeding Edge
description: The Bleeding Edge mod increases critical damage on Archwing melee by 10% per rank at a maximum of 110% at rank 10.

name: Mantis
description: The Mantis is a Landing Craft, which can serve as an alternative transportation choice to the Liset. If the Mantis is the selected Landing Craft, using an Air Support Charge will have Ordis deploy a Med Tower resembling a Life Support Capsule that heals for 100 Health upon each activation, with each Med Tower providing up to 20 healing charges that can be activated by any player. It landed in Update 17.5.

name: Shred
description: The Shred mod increases the Fire Rate of Primary weapons by 5% and Punch Through by 0.2 meter per rank for a maximum of 30% and 1.2 meter at Rank 5, respectively.

name: Serration
description: The Serration mod increases the base damage of primary weapons (excluding shotguns) by 15% per rank, at a maximum of 165% at rank 10.

name: Scimitar
description: The Scimitar is a Landing Craft, which can serve as an alternative transportation choice to the Liset. If the Scimitar is the selected Landing Craft, using an Air Support Charge will have Ordis deploy a Carpet Bomb ability. The Scimitar landed in Update 18.0.

name: Quick Return
description: Quick Return decreases the number of bounces before a Glaive weapon returns to the player.

name: Lightning Rod
description: Lightning Rod increases the Electrical Damage resistance of a Warframe's health and shields.

name: Rage
description: Rage is a Warframe mod that converts a percentage of Health damage received into Energy.

name: Bane of Grineer
description: Bane of Grineer increases the damage of rifles against Grineer. The mod increases both the base damage and elemental damage of a weapon.

name: Reflex Guard
description: The Reflex Guard mod grants a chance for a Warframe to automatically parry incoming attacks.

name: Everlasting Ward
description: Everlasting Ward is an Warframe Augment Mod for Chroma that allows allies to retain Elemental Ward's effects upon moving out of its range, lasting for a percentage of Elemental Ward's remaining duration.

name: Jolt
description: The Jolt mod increases both the  Electricity damage and Status Chance of a pistol by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

name: Shattering Impact
description: Shattering Impact is a melee mod added in Update 17.0 that permanently reduces an enemy's base armor by 1 per rank upon dealing  Impact damage with a melee weapon.

name: Automatic Trigger
description: Automatic Trigger increases the Fire Rate of Arch-guns by 7.5% per rank, at a maximum of 45% at rank 5.

name: Armored Recovery
description: Armored Recovery is a PvP-exclusive exilus mod that grants damage resistance while knocked down at the cost of reducing slide distance.

name: Slip Magazine
description: The Slip Magazine increases magazine capacity of a pistol by 5% per rank for a maximum of 30% at rank 5.

name: Pacifying Bolts
description: Pacifying Bolts is a Warframe Augment Mod for Nyx that gives Psychic Bolts the ability to temporarily stun enemies.

name: Metal Fiber
description: Metal Fiber increases the armor of a Sentinel.

name: Energy Amplifier
description: The Energy Amplifier mod increases the Power Range of an Archwing by 10% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 5.

name: Lasting Purity
description: The Lasting Purity mod is a Weapon Augment Mod that adds Dead Aim (damage while zoomed in) and Purity specifically for the Vulkar and Vulkar Wraith. It increases Dead Aim by 15% and Purity by 0.25 per rank, at a maximum of 60% and 1 at rank 3, respectively.

name: Magazine Extension
description: The Magazine Extension mod increases the magazine capacity of Archwing guns by 10% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 5.

name: Searing Steel
description: The Searing Steel mod increases the  Heat damage and Status Chance on Archwing melee weapons by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

name: Accelerated Deflection
description: Accelerated Deflection increases the shield recharge rate Sentinels. It has no effect on the recharge delay.

name: Iron Vault
description: Iron Vault is a Warframe Augment Mod for Wukong. Aiming Iron Jab at the ground will launch Wukong into the air, and any Slam Attack performed will gain additional range and damage.

name: Creeping Terrify
description: Creeping Terrify is a Warframe Augment Mod for Nekros' Terrify that slows down affected enemies.

name: Infiltrate
description: Infiltrate is a Warframe Augment Mod for Ivara that allows her to pass through security barriers unharmed, and increases her movement speed while Prowl is active.

name: Primed Pressure Point
description: Primed Pressure Point is the Primed version of the Pressure Point mod that increases a melee weapon base damage by 15% per rank, at a maximum of 165% at rank 10.

name: Cold Snap
description: Cold Snap is an Itzal Augment Mod for Cosmic Crush that inflicts a  Cold proc to any enemy affected by the ability, with enemies close to the player being frozen outright.

name: Dual Decurion
description: The Dual Decurion are twin rifles exclusive to the Archwing flight system.

name: Toxic Blight
description: The Toxic Blight mod is a Weapon Augment Mod that increases  Toxin damage and Blight specifically for the Mire. It increases  Toxin by 25% and Blight by 0.25 per rank, at a maximum of 100% and 1 at rank 3, respectively.

name: Fatal Acceleration
description: Fatal Acceleration increases flight speed of Shotgun rounds.

name: Phaedra
description: The Phaedra is a large-caliber Archwing rifle that shares design aesthetics and mechanics to the Soma. It was released in Update 17.5.

name: Melee Prowess
description: Melee Prowess increases the status effect chance of melee weapons.

name: Entropy Spike
description: The Entropy Spike mod is a Weapon Augment Mod that adds an explosion chance and Entropy specifically for the Bolto. It increases the explosion chance by 0.05 and Entropy by 0.25 per rank, at a maximum of 0.2 and 1 at rank 3, respectively. Explosions deal 250  Blast damage to the target, as well as to nearby enemies within 10 meters of the blast (scaled by distance).

name: Centaur
description: The Centaur is an Archwing based melee that also acts as a shield, which shares its own basic six-hit combo with Rathbone, but also possesses its own six-hit combo when used in quick melee (primary weapon equipped).

name: Chilling Grasp
description: The Chilling Grasp mod increases  Cold damage on shotguns by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at rank 5. The picture shows a Frost with a Strun, and a frozen Corpus Crewman.

name: Rending Crane
description: Rending Crane is one of the Stance Mods for Heavy Blade melee weapons, which specializes in overhead slashes with powerful knockdown finishers.

name: Onorix
description: The Onorix is a heavy axe designed for use with the Archwing flight system.

name: Point Blank

description: The Secura Penta is the Perrin Sequence exclusive version of the Penta grenade launcher. Compared to the regular Penta, it has a significantly increased rate of fire, increased magazine capacity, and slightly increased explosion damage. It also comes with an innate Sequence effect.
