description: Captura is an image capture and editing tool that allows players to manipulate and compose scenarios for screenshots.

name: Kavasa Prime Collar
description: The Kavasa Prime Collar is a Prime collar of Orokin design that can be equipped on a player's Kubrow. It records their genetic memory and DNA, allowing them to be reconstructed in an Incubator, just like the Taichen Collar. Equipping the collar grants +10 Health, +10 Shields, and +100 Armor to a kubrow. Health bonus is modified by DNA Stability.

name: Valana Ayatan Sculpture
description: Ayatan Sculptures are ancient Orokin treasures powered by Endo that can be discovered across the system. There are two types available: the Sculptures themselvеs, and smaller Stars which can be inserted into the larger Sculptures to increase their value. These can be traded to Maroo at her Bazaar for varying amounts of Endo, or placed within the Orbiter as decorations.

name: Second Wind
description: The Second Wind mod gives Stamina when an enemy is killed using Channeling, at the cost of Channeling efficiency.

name: Small Goopolla
description: A predatory fish that is attracted to the scent of blood.

name: Hallowed Reckoning
description: Hallowed Reckoning is a Warframe Augment Mod for Oberon that makes enemies damaged by Reckoning create fields of Hallowed Ground that deal damage-over-time to enemies standing in them, while providing armor to allies.

name: Primed Bane of Corrupted
description: Primed Bane of Corrupted is the Primed version of the Bane of Corrupted mod, which increases the damage of rifles against Corrupted. The mod increases both the base damage and elemental damage of a weapon.

name: Arcane Fury
description: Arcane Fury is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance upon delivering a critical Hit to increase Melee Damage for  a short time.

name: Large Karkina
description: A crustacean that hunts during the twilight hours.

name: Medium Khut-Khut
description: A poisonous fish protected by a hard carapace around its skull.

name: Arcane Aegis
description: Arcane Aegis is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance whenever the player receives damage to regenerate Warframe Shield for a short time.

name: Arcane Consequence
description: Arcane Consequence is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance whenever the player upon achieving a headshot to increase Wall Latch and Aim Glide for a short time.

name: Cyclone Kraken
description: Cyclone Kraken is a Stance mod for Machete-type weapons.

name: Arcane Energize
description: Arcane Energize is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance to replenish additional energy for you and nearby allies whenever an Energy Orb is picked up.

name: Gladiator Resolve
description: Gladiator Resolve is a set mod that increases the health of a Warframe.

name: Vulkar Wraith
description: The Vulkar Wraith is the Wraith variant of the Vulkar.This weapon can be sold for 7,500‍ 7,500.

name: Magnetized Discharge
description: Magnetized Discharge is a Warframe Augment Mod for Mag's Magnetize that allows manual detonation by recasting the ability on an active Magnetize bubble. Enemies hit by the detonation have a chance to be disarmed.

name: Orvius Disc
description: The Orvius is a throwing melee weapon used by Teshin. The Orvius blueprint is awarded to players upon completion of The War Within quest.

name: Vazarin Lens
description: Focus Abilities can be upgraded through the use of Focus Points, which are earned through the use of a Focus Lens, a special item that converts 1.25% of Affinity earned to Focus Points, before allocating the points to either Warframe only, or split between Warframe and weapon when using a weapon. Focus Lenses can only be installed on Rank 30 Warframes, Weapons, Archwings, and Archwing weapons. Only excess experience points gained after Rank 30 is converted to Focus points; if a Focus Lens-equipped item is polarized, the item will not convert Focus points until it has once again reached Rank 30. Items can only have one Focus Lens installed at any time; while players can install another Focus Lens over the old one, the previously installed Lens will be lost in the process.

name: Small Mawfish
description: Its gaping maw allows it to scoop up smaller fish as it swims by them.

name: Prisma Angstrum
description: The Prisma Angstrum is the Prisma variant of the Corpus-built rocket pistol, Angstrum.

name: Small Murkray
description: A cunning hunter that hides within the mud at the bottom of the lake and ambushes passing prey.

name: Madurai Transmute Core
description: Madurai Transmute Core is a special Core that can be used as an ingredient in Transmutation. When transmuted alongside other Mods, the core ensures that the resulting Mod will be of  Madurai Polarity. Using a Transmutation Core also removes the credit cost for that transmutation, allowing for cheaper attempts at transmuting Rare-quality Mods. Transmutation Cores do not guarantee the rarity of the resulting mod, only their polarity.

name: Negation Swarm
description: Negation Swarm is a Warframe Augment Mod for Inaros that allows Scarab Swarm to block incoming Status Effects, draining a percentage of bonus Armor for every Status Effect blocked.

name: Naramon Transmute Core
description: Naramon Transmutate Core is a special Core that can be used as an ingredient in Transmutation. When transmuted alongside other Mods, the core ensures that the resulting Mod will be of  Naramon Polarity. Using a Transmutation Core also removes the credit cost for that transmutation, allowing for cheaper attempts at transmuting Rare-quality Mods. Transmutation Cores do not guarantee the rarity of the resulting mod, only their polarity.

name: Banshee Prime
description: Release date: 28 February 2017. Banshee Prime is the Prime variant of the Banshee Warframe featuring higher armor, sprint speed, and power values, as well as an additional Naramon Pol polarity.

name: Vazarin Transmute Core
description: Vazarin Transmutate Core is a special Core that can be used as an ingredient in Transmutation. When transmuted alongside other Mods, the core ensures that the resulting Mod will be of  Vazarin Polarity. Using a Transmutation Core also removes the credit cost for that transmutation, allowing for cheaper attempts at transmuting Rare-quality Mods. Transmutation Cores do not guarantee the rarity of the resulting mod, only their polarity.

name: Augur Message
description: Augur Message is a set mod available from bounties on the Plains of Eidolon. It increases the Ability Duration of the Warframe by +24% at max rank, with the full Set Bonus applied 150% of the Energy spent with the Abilities is converted into Shields.

name: Vengeful Revenant
description: Vengeful Revenant is a Stance Mod for Sword type weapons.

name: Astral Autopsy
description: Astral Autopsy is an Archwing melee mod that allows melee kills to count as scans for the Codex, assuming Codex Scanner charges are available.

name: Entropy Detonation
description: Entropy Detonation causes lethal ground finishers used by the Obex (or its Prisma variant) to cause enemies to explode, dealing damage to other nearby enemies. It also adds an Entropy effect.

name: Agile Aim
description: Agile Aim is a rifle mod usable in both PvE and PvP that increases movement speed while aiming.

name: Medium Karkina
description: A crustacean that hunts during the twilight hours.

name: Air Recon
description: Air Recon is a pistol mod usable in both PvE and PvP that decreases zoom during Aim Glide.

name: Anticipation
description: Anticipation is a PvP-exclusive Exilus mod that grants temporary immunity to either staggers or knockdowns depending on which was received.

name: Euphona Prime
description: The Euphona Prime is a Prime shotgun type sidearm and the signature weapon of Banshee Prime, capable of two different firing modes. The primary fire shoots a slug for longer range engagements while the Alternate Fire shoots wider spread shots for close range fights.

name: Apex Predator
description: Apex Predator is a PvP-exclusive rifle mod that causes targets that are hit to be temporarily visible on the minimap.

name: Stinging Thorn
description: Stinging Thorn is a Stance mod for Daggers introduced in the Plains of Eidolon update.

name: Broad Eye
description: Broad Eye is a shotgun mod usable in both PvE and PvP that decreases zoom during Aim Glide.

name: Flux Overdrive
description: Flux Overdrive is an Index Mod for the Flux Rifle that increases its Status Chance by a random value for every second it remains fired.

name: Calculated Spring
description: Calculated Spring is a PvP-exclusive Exilus mod that increases Health at the cost of reduced Mobility.

name: Small Norg
description: This fish inhabits the shallows and feeds of crabs and other small crustaceans. When threatened it forces air into its brain to give it the impression of being much bigger than it normally is.

name: Medium Tralok
description: Strong, predatory fish with eyes that can pierce the darkest shadows.

name: Calculated Victory
description: Calculated Victory was a PvP-exclusive pistol mod that gave a chance to restore shields on kill.

name: Comet Rounds
description: Comet Rounds is a PvP exclusive rifle Mod that converts an amount of physical damage to Impact damage

name: Counterweight
description: Counterweight is a PvP exclusive melee Mod that converts an amount of physical damage to Impact damage

name: Vay Hek Frequency Triangulator
description: Vay Hek Frequency Triangulator was a key item crafted with Beacons found from Prosecutors on Ceres Grineer Shipyard tileset. The blueprint could have been purchased on the market.. This key used to be the only way players can attain access to Councilor Vay Hek's assassination node until Update 15.13, with the access requirement replaced by simply having a Mastery Rank of 5. This item currently serves no purpose, along with the Beacons that make it.

name: Crash Shot
description: Crash Shot is a PvP exclusive shotgun mod that converts an amount of physical damage to Impact damage.

name: Double-Barrel Drift
description: Double-Barrel Drift is a shotgun mod usable in both PvE and PvP that reduces recoil and spread when firing while sliding.

name: Voltage Sequence
description: Voltage Sequence turns flying enemies killed by Lanka into electric traps for a short duration. It also adds a Sequence effect.

name: Eject Magazine
description: Eject Magazine is a pistol mod usable in both PvE and PvP that reloads a portion of a secondary weapon's magazine for each second while holstered.

name: Enguard
description: Enguard was a PvP exclusive utility mod that prevents the player from becoming knocked down after a previous knock down has been inflicted.

name: Vigilante Supplies
description: Vigilante Supplies is a set mod that converts any unused ammo type into Rifle Ammo. The affected rifle will only convert ammo while equipped, and will not convert any ammo type used by holstered secondary weapons until their own ammo is full.

name: Explosive Demise
description: Explosive Demise is a melee mod in PvP which causes killed enemies to explode shortly after death, dealing damage to surrounding enemies.

name: Rifle Riven Mod (Veiled)
description: For Rifles

name: Flak Shot
description: Flak Shot is a PvP exclusive shotgun mod that converts an amount of physical damage to Slash damage.

name: Follow Through
description: Follow Through is a Warframe mod for PvP that grants +5 energy on Respawn

name: Target Acquired
description: Target Acquired is a sniper mod that increases the Headshot Multiplier.

name: Impaler Munitions
description: Impaler Munitions is a PvP exclusive Pistol Mod that converts an amount of physical damage to Puncture damage.

name: Impenetrable Offense
description: Impenetrable Offense is a PvP-exclusive mod that increases Damage Block at max Energy.

name: Lie In Wait
description: Lie In Wait is a PvP-exclusive sniper rifle mod that increases damage dealt while zoomed at the cost of higher recoil.

name: Boar Prime
description: The Boar Prime is an ancient Orokin automatic shotgun that serves as an upgraded version of the Boar. The Boar Prime further improves on the strengths of the Boar, focusing on a high rate of fire, spread, and magazine capacity, on top of improving overall damage. This gives the Boar Prime extremely high damage per second, mitigated only by the short-comings of its predecessor, with its inability to effectively engage targets past short range.

name: Lock and Load
description: Lock and Load is a shotgun mod usable in both PvE and PvP that reloads a portion of a shotgun's magazine for each second it is holstered.

name: Low Current Leap
description: Low Current Leap is a Warframe mod in PvP that increases Mobility for a decrease of Power Max.

name: Martial Fury
description: Martial Fury is a melee mod in PvP which increases attack speed 20% on hit for 20 seconds with a melee weapon equipped.

name: Meteor Munitions
description: Meteor Munitions is a PvP exclusive pistol Mod that converts an amount of physical damage to Impact damage.

name: Momentary Pause
description: Momentary Pause was a PvP-exclusive shotgun mod that gave a chance to restore health on kill.

name: Boltor Prime
description: The Boltor Prime is the prime variant of the Boltor rifle. Like its classic version, its bolts' flight time require compensation, making this weapon more difficult to use at longer ranges, and requiring the user to lead targets for effectiveness. Despite this, the Boltor Prime can easily punish close-range targets with its high damage.

name: Braton Prime
description: The Braton Prime is an ancient Orokin assault rifle that serves as an upgrade of the Braton. It features higher base damage and magazine capacity compared to the standard Braton, at the cost of lower ammo reserves. The Braton Prime sports a higher ratio of  Slash damage than the basic Braton, though its  Impact damage is comparatively lower. Overall, the Braton Prime is a formidable weapon, and is considered to be a reasonable upgrade from the basic Braton.

name: Overcharged
description: Overcharged is a PvP-exclusive mod that converts up to 25 respawn Energy to Overshield.

name: Overcharge Detectors
description: Overcharge Detectors is a mod in PvP that exposes enemies within a certain range if they are at their maximum energy capacity.

name: Overview
description: Overview is a rifle mod usable in both PvE and PvP that decreases Zoom during Aim Glide.

name: Prize Kill
description: Prize Kill was a PvP-exclusive shotgun mod that gave a chance to restore shields on kill.

name: Quick Charge
description: Quick Charge is a PvP-exclusive Warframe mod that reduces the recharge delay after the shield is damaged for the cost of Shield Capacity

name: Razor Munitions
description: Razor Munitions is a PvP exclusive Pistol Mod that converts an amount of damage to Slash damage.

name: Recover
description: Recover was a PvP-exclusive rifle mod that gave a chance to restore health on kill.

name: Recuperate
description: Recuperate was a PvP-exclusive secondary weapon mod that gave a chance to restore health on each kill.

name: Reflex Draw
description: Reflex Draw is a pistol mod usable in both PvE and PvP that increases the holster rate of secondary weapons.

name: Relentless Assault
description: Relentless Assault is a PvP-exclusive melee mod which increases melee attack speed at the cost of decreased blocking effectiveness.

name: Ripper Rounds
description: Ripper Rounds is a PvP exclusive Rifle Mod that converts an amount of physical damage to Puncture damage.

name: Rising Skill
description: Rising Skill is a PvP-exclusive Warframe Mod that increases Mobility and reduce Shield Capacity.

name: Searing Leap
description: Searing Leap is a PvP-exclusive Exilus mod that increases Bullet Jump speed and grants  Heat damage to Bullet Jumps at Max Energy.

name: Bronco Prime
description: The Bronco Prime features a higher base damage and magazine size than the Bronco, at the cost of a lower fire rate and reload speed. The Bronco Prime was added into the game in Update 9.0.

name: Serrated Edges
description: Serrated Edges is a PvP exclusive Melee Mod that converts an amount of physical damage to Puncture damage.

name: Serrated Rounds
description: Serrated Rounds is a PvP exclusive Rifle Mod that converts an amount of physical damage to Slash damage.

name: Sharpened Blade
description: Sharpened Blade is a PvP exclusive Melee Mod that converts an amount of physical damage to Slash damage.

name: Burston Prime
description: The Burston Prime is the prime variant of the Burston. Compared to its predecessor, the Burston Prime features higher damage across the board, and a slightly higher status chance, making it a direct upgrade from the standard Burston. Like the standard Burston, the Burston Prime features the signature three-round burst mechanic, making it difficult for some Tenno to use, but rewarding if one can learn the patterns.

name: Snap Shot
description: Snap Shot is a shotgun mod usable in both PvE and PvP that increases movement speed while aiming.

name: Soft Hands
description: Soft Hands is a shotgun mod usable in both PvE and PvP that increases the holster rate of shotguns.

name: Spring-Loaded Broadhead
description: Spring-Loaded Broadhead is a Daikyu-exclusive mod usable in both PvE and PvP that gives the Daikyu a damage bonus against targets 15 meters away or further.

name: Spry Sights
description: Spry Sights is a pistol mod usable in both PvE and PvP that increases movement speed while aiming.

name: Stand Ground
description: Stand Ground is a melee mod in PvP that reduces damage taken from enemy abilities while blocking.

name: Strafing Slide
description: Strafing Slide is a pistol mod usable in both PvE and PvP that reduces recoil and spread when firing while sliding.

name: Glaive Prime
description: The Glaive Prime is a Primed version of the Glaive. The Glaive Prime was added into the game in Update 11.0. If thrown, this weapon will bounce five times before returning to its owner or after reaching 30m away from its owner.

name: Surplus Diverters
description: Surplus Diverters is a mod in PvP that grants energy upon replenishing shields completely without interruption after they have been deactivated.

name: Sword Alone
description: Sword Alone is a melee mod in PvP that increases Mobility if a Melee is equipped.

name: Tactical Reload
description: Tactical Reload is a rifle mod usable in both PvE and PvP that reloads a portion of a rifle's magazine for each second it is holstered.

name: Tear Gas
description: Tear Gas is a PvP Warframe Augment Mod for Ash's Smoke Screen which blinds enemies temporarily.

name: Tempered Bound
description: Tempered Bound is a PvP-exclusive Warframe Mod that reduce Mobility and increases Shield Capacity.

name: Focused Acceleration
description: Focused Acceleration is PvP-exclusive Tetra mod which increases Projectile Speed when aiming.

name: Full Capacity
description: Full Capacity is a PvP-exclusive secondary weapon mod  mod which grants increased magazine capacity at the cost of reduced reload speed.

name: Gorgon Frenzy
description: Gorgon Frenzy is PvP-exclusive Gorgon mod which increases Fire Rate on Kills.

name: Grinloked
description: Grinloked is PvP-exclusive Grinlok mod which increases accuracy while aiming.

name: Hastened Steps
description: Hastened Steps is a PvP-exclusive Warframe mod which provides more Sprint speed at the cost of reduced Shield capacity.

name: Lex Prime
description: The Lex Prime is the primed version of the Lex heavy pistol, featuring improved stats.

name: Heavy Warhead
description: Heavy Warhead is PvP-exclusive Pistol Mod which increases explosion radius for a reduction in flight speed.

name: Heightened Reflexes
description: Heightened Reflexes is a PvP Warframe mod which increases casting speed at the cost of reduced Power Efficiency.

name: Loose Magazine
description: Loose Magazine is a PvP-exclusive secondary weapon mod which grants improved reload speed at the cost of increased recoil.

name: Lucky Shot
description: Lucky Shot is a PvP-exclusive rifle mod which provides faster projectile flight speed at the cost of reduced accuracy.

name: Maximum Capacity
description: Maximum Capacity is a PvP-exclusive assault rifle mod which increases magazine capacity at the cost of a slower reload speed.

name: Mortal Conduct
description: Mortal Conduct is PvP-exclusive Melee Mod which increases Channeled Damage Reflection at low Health

name: Sicarus Prime
description: The Sicarus Prime is an improved Sicarus that sacrifices nearly half of its  Impact damage to double  Puncture and  Slash damage, and also sports higher accuracy, faster fire rate, and a larger magazine compared to its predecessor.

name: Plan B
description: Plan B is PvP-exclusive Bow Mod which increases Fire Rate for Secondary Weapons on Hits.

name: Argon Scope
description: Argon Scope is a rare rifle mod that increases critical chance while aiming for a brief time upon a headshot.

name: Sharpened Bullets
description: Sharpened Bullets is an uncommon Pistol mod that increases Critical damage while aiming for a brief time upon a kill.

name: Health Conversion
description: Health Conversion is a Warframe mod that grants additional armor that stacks up to 3 times on picking up a health orb. Taking damage will consume a stack after 3 seconds.  This armor bonus is taken into account for abilities that use armor to calculate aspects of their functionality, including Rhino's Iron Skin, Nezha's Warding Halo, and Frost's Snow Globe.

name: Flame Repellent
description: Flame Repellent increases the  Heat resistance of a Warframe's health and shields.

name: Quanta Vandal
description: The Quanta Vandal is the Vandal form of the Quanta mining laser cutter, offered as a reward for attaining a minimum of 1,500 points in the Operation False Profit event. It features a larger magazine size, higher status chance and increased secondary fire damage output over the original.

name: Shock Absorbers
description: The Shock Absorbers mod increases a Warframe's damage resistance while knocked down.

name: Narrow Minded
description: Narrow Minded increases Power Duration while reducing Power Range of Warframe abilities.

name: Sure Shot
description: Sure Shot increases the Status Chance of Pistols.

name: Ferocity
description: The Ferocity  mod allows the Sahasa Kubrow to use finisher attacks on enemies.

name: High Voltage
description: The High Voltage mod increases both the  Electricity damage and Status Chance of a rifle by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

name: Vauban Prime
description: Release Date: May 17th, 2016. Vauban Prime is the Prime variant of the Vauban Warframe featuring higher shields and armor values, as well as an additional  polarity.

name: Targeting Receptor
description: Targeting Receptor allows Helios to attack a nearby enemy with "a devastating Glaive-esque attack".

name: Pistol Scavenger
description: Pistol Scavenger is an Aura that increases the amount of pistol ammo recovered per drop.

name: Regen
description: Regen allows a Sentinel to regenerate once per mission if killed.

name: Fragor Prime
description: Fragor Prime is the Prime variant of the Fragor.

name: Hush
description: The Hush mod reduces Noise Level on rifles. At max rank, it renders any rifles completely silent and undetectable while firing.

name: Scattering Inferno
description: The Scattering Inferno mod increases both the  Heat damage and Status Chance of a shotgun by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

name: Speed Trigger
description: The Speed Trigger mod increases a primary weapon's fire rate by 10% per rank for a maximum of 60% at Rank 5.

name: Crimson Dervish
description: Crimson Dervish is a Stance for swords, specializing in strong spinning attacks that can hit adjacent enemies or deal multiple strikes against a single foe, sacrificing mobility and speed. Combos executed in this stance are notable for their high damage multiplier.

name: Akstiletto Prime
description: Akstiletto Prime is the Prime variant of the Akstiletto.

name: Deep Freeze
description: Deep Freeze increases  Cold damage on a secondary weapon by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at rank 5.

name: Physique
description: Physique is an Aura that increases maximum health.

name: Maim
description: The Maim mod increases  Slash damage of a pistol by 20% per rank for a maximum of 120% at rank 5.

name: Looter
description: Looter allows the Carrier to break nearby containers by shooting them.

name: Air Thrusters
description: Air Thrusters is a PvP-exclusive Warframe mod that reduces Mobility and gives the player a Slide Boost while airborne.

name: Rifle Aptitude
description: Rifle Aptitude increases the Status Chance of Rifles.

name: Fatal Teleport
description: Fatal Teleport is a Warframe Augment Mod for Ash's Teleport that immediately performs a melee finisher upon teleporting to the target, with an additional damage multiplier. Additionally, if the finisher kills its target, 50% of Teleport's energy cost is refunded.

name: Tesla Link
description: Tesla Link is a Warframe Augment Mod for Vauban that makes each pair of Tesla balls form energy links between each other that deal  Slash damage upon contact.

name: Pistol Ammo Mutation
description: Pistol Ammo Mutation is a pistol mod that converts any unused ammo type into Pistol Ammo, or Sniper Ammo in the case of most explosive sidearms. The affected pistol will only convert ammo while equipped, and will not convert any ammo type used by holstered primary weapons until their own ammo is full.

name: Poisonous Sting
description: The Poisonous Sting mod adds  Toxin damage on Archwing melee weapons by 20% per rank at a maximum of 120% at rank 5.

name: Dual Rounds
description: The Dual Rounds mod increases the Multishot chance of Archwing guns by 5% per rank at a maximum of 30% at rank 5.

name: Burdened Magazine
description: Burdened Magazine increases magazine capacity while reducing the reload speed of Shotguns.

name: Metal Auger
description: Metal Auger increases Punch Through for Rifles.

name: Master Thief
description: Master Thief grants a chance of unlocking locked lockers.

name: Arrow Mutation
description: Arrow Mutation is a bow mod that converts any unused ammo type into Arrows, though does not affect their ammo capacity. The affected bow will only convert ammo while equipped, and will not convert any ammo type used by holstered secondary weapons until their own ammo is full.

name: Furor
description: The Furor mod increases the attack speed of Archwing melee weapons by 2.5% per rank at a maximum of 10% at rank 3.

name: Virulent Scourge
description: The Virulent Scourge mod increases both the  Toxin Damage and Status Chance of a melee weapon by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

name: Hastened Deflection
description: Hastened Deflection speeds up a Kubrow's shield regeneration rate. It has no effect on recharge delay.

name: True Steel
description: The True Steel mod increases critical chance on a melee weapon by 10% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 5.

name: Resonating Quake
description: Resonating Quake is an Warframe Augment Mod for Banshee that increases Sound Quake's damage, range and energy drain for every second it is active.

name: Vital Sense
description: The Vital Sense mod increases critical damage on rifles by 20% per rank for a maximum of 120% at Rank 5.

name: Phoenix Renewal
description: Phoenix Renewal is an Warframe Augment Mod for Oberon's Renewal. If a player takes fatal damage while under the effects of Renewal, they are instead healed a percentage of health. However, the augment's effects will only occur once per ally, and has a 90-second cooldown before another player can be affected.

name: Flailing Branch
description: Flailing Branch is a Stance mod for staff weapons.

name: Silent Battery
description: The Silent Battery mod reduces Noise Level on shotguns. At max rank, it renders any shotgun completely silent and undetectable while firing.

name: Gleaming Talon
description: Gleaming Talon is one of two available Stance mods for Glaives, which combines whirling attacks with explosive weapon throws.

name: Crowd Dispersion
description: Crowd Dispersion allows Wyrm to release a shockwave when multiple enemies are nearby.

name: Blind Justice
description: Blind Justice is a Stance mod for Nikanas, specializing in high mobility combined with fast overhead slashes.

name: Astral Slash
description: The Astral Slash mod increases melee Slash damage of an Archwing melee weapon by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at rank 5.

name: Efficient Transferral
description: Efficient Transferral increases Power Duration of Archwing's abilities by 7.5% per rank at a maximum of 30% at rank 3.

description: Surging Dash is a Warframe Augment Mod for Excalibur, allowing each enemy hit by Slash Dash to add to the Warframe's Melee Combo Counter.

description: Seeking Shuriken is an Ash Warframe Augment Mod that allows Shuriken to temporarily reduce the armor of their targets.

name: Despoil
description: Despoil is a Warframe Augment Mod that allows Nekros to consume health instead of energy to cast Desecrate.

name: Jet Stream
description: Jet Stream is a Warframe Augment Mod for Zephyr that grants Turbulence the ability to provide additional movement speed and projectile speed for Zephyr and nearby allies.

name: Corvas
description: The Corvas flak cannon is a heavy shotgun designed for exclusive use with the Archwing flight system, introduced in Update 15.0. It can be rapidly fired to saturate an area with pellets, or charged to release a more powerful scattershot.

name: Shocking Speed
description: Shocking Speed is a Warframe Augment Mod for Volt's Speed that causes him and his allies to inflict  Electric damage and status to enemies they touch while moving.

name: Arcane Avenger
description: Arcane Avenger is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance whenever the player receives damage to increase the critical chance of all attacks for a short time.

name: Arcane Phantasm
description: Arcane Phantasm is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance on performing a parry to increase Warframe sprint speed for a short time.

name: Galatine Prime
description: Galatine Prime is the primed variant of the Galatine heavy sword.

name: Perpetual Vortex
description: Perpetual Vortex is a Warframe Augment Mod for Vauban's Vortex that increases its duration for every additional Vortex thrown into it.

name: Vexing Retaliation
description: Vexing Retaliation is a PvE Warframe Augment for Chroma that makes Vex Armor detonate an area-of-effect attack upon receiving 150 incoming damage, dealing procs on enemies.

name: Synoid Simulor
description: The Synoid Simulor is a custom-version of the Simulor available only from Cephalon Suda, which launches orbs of gravitational force. These orbs can be manipulated to produce either explosions or implosions.  Featuring improved stats, the Synoid Simulor also features innate Entropy effect.

name: Rakta Cernos
description: The Rakta Cernos is a modified Cernos bow exclusively available to the Red Veil. It features the fastest charge time of all bows, along with increased base damage, status chance, and innate Blight effect.

name: Sancti Tigris
description: The Sancti Tigris is a Tigris variant available only from New Loka. Featuring increased damage, reload speed, and critical chance, the Sancti Tigris also comes with an innate Purity effect.

name: Pistol Amp
description: Pistol Amp is an aura that that increases the damage dealt with Secondary Weapons.

name: Growing Power
description: Growing Power is an Aura that temporarily increases Power Strength after inflicting a Status Effect on an enemy unit.

name: Shotgun Amp
description: Shotgun Amp is an aura that increases the damage dealt with shotguns by 3% per rank, up to 18% at full rank.

name: Empowered Blades
description: Empowered Blades is an aura that increases status chance and status damage (where applicable) of charged melee attacks, at the cost of draining a portion of shields per hit.

name: Stand United
description: Stand United is an Aura that increases Armor.

name: Brief Respite
description: Brief Respite is an aura that grants additional Shields equal to a percentage of Energy spent whenever an ability is cast.

name: Arcane Nullifier
description: Arcane Nullifier is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance to resist a  Magnetic damage effect entirely.

name: Assimilate
description: Assimilate is a Warframe Augment Mod for Nyx that allows her to move while channeling Absorb, at the cost of shrinking Absorb's effective radius by 50%.

name: Machete Wraith
description: The Machete Wraith is a unique Wraith variant of the Machete, featuring an increased base damage. Originally obtained from completing at least 25 missions during The Gradivus Dilemma, the Machete Wraith is the second Wraith weapon to be released, after the Strun Wraith.

name: Safeguard
description: Safeguard is a Warframe Augment Mod for Nezha that allows him to cast Warding Halo on allies, albeit with reduced durability.

name: Prova Vandal
description: The Prova Vandal is the Vandal version of the Prova melee weapon, offering greater damage and status chance than the standard version. Originally a potential reward for The Gradivus Dilemma, it was later offered as a reward for getting at least 48 points in a single mission in the Operation Breeding Grounds event.

name: Path of Statues
description: Path of Statues is a Warframe Augment Mod for Atlas, that makes Landslide leave a petrifying path for a short period.

name: Contagion Cloud
description: Contagion Cloud is a Warframe Augment Mod for Saryn that makes melee kills made with Toxic Lash leave behind a gas cloud that deals  Toxin damage to enemies within it for 12 seconds.

name: Hysterical Assault
description: Hysterical Assault is a Warframe Augment Mod for Valkyr that allows her to pounce onto enemies while in Hysteria, dealing damage on contact.

name: Flash Accelerant
description: Flash Accelerant is a Warframe Augment Mod for Ember that allows Accelerant to affect friendly players within range, increasing their casting speed and giving them bonus  Heat damage.

name: Adept Surge
description: Adept Surge is a PvP-exclusive Warframe mod that increases Mobility at the cost of Health.

name: Telos Boltace
description: The Telos Boltace is the Syndicate variant of the Boltace, available only from the Arbiters of Hexis. On slide attacks, the weapon produces an energy wave from the player that spreads in all directions, dealing high damage to nearby enemies. Additionally, switching to the Telos Boltace increases the velocity or duration of certain Maneuvers.

name: Synoid Heliocor
description: The Synoid Heliocor is the Syndicate variant of the Heliocor, unique to Cephalon Suda. In addition to its ability to scan targets it kills into the Codex, this Synoid version also creates a friendly Specter of an enemy it kills with a channeled strike, so long as said enemy's Codex entry is complete.

name: Secura Lecta
description: The Secura Lecta is the Syndicate variant of the Lecta, exclusive to the Perrin Sequence, with the unique ability to double the amount of credits dropped by enemies it kills.

name: Amesha
description: The Amesha is a support-type Archwing that sacrifices offensive power in exchange for area-of-effect defensive abilities that can buff and heal allies and weaken enemies.

description: Cunning Aspect is a PvP exclusive Stance mod for Rapiers.

description: Cat's eye mod allows a Adarza Kavat to provide an additive Critical Hit buff to nearby allies.

name: Argent Scourge
description: Argent Scourge is a PvP exclusive Stance mod for Polearms.

name: Reflect
description: Adarza Kavat will occasionally reflect and amplify damage back to an enemy. It seems to only happen when the kavat takes damage, and not when the player does.

name: Rending Wind
description: Rending Wind is a PvP exclusive Stance mod for Machetes.

name: Noble Cadence
description: Noble Cadence is a PvP exclusive Stance mod for Heavy Blades.

name: Thermagnetic Shells
description: Thermagnetic Shells is an Index Mod for the Detron that causes killed enemies to explode, dealing radial Magnetic damage to enemies within 6 meters of the target.

name: Kinetic Ricochet
description: Kinetic Ricochet  is a mod that allows shots from the Tetra to bounce and travel further.

name: Medi-Pet Kit
description: Medi-Pet Kit is a companion Index mod that provides health regeneration and a bleedout timer increase to the companion.

name: Shield Charger
description: Shield Charger is a Sentinel Mod that periodically increases your Warframe's Max Shields and Shield Regen for a certain amount of time.

name: Rakta Dark Dagger
description: The Rakta Dark Dagger is the Syndicate variant of the Dark Dagger, available from the Red Veil. While held, It reduces visibility  and restores shields or grants overshields when damaging a target afflicted by  Radiation.

name: Static Discharge
description: Static Discharge is a Melee Mod for the Prova and Prova Vandal that causes Charge Attacks to deal AoE Electricity damage to nearby enemies.

description: Void Relics are Orokin objects that can be opened to reveal valuable treasure enclosed within by completing Void Fissure missions. They are the principal means of acquiring Prime and Forma Blueprints.

name: Pain Threshold
description: Pain Threshold is an exilus Index mod that increases the stagger recovery of your Warframe.

name: Chilling Reload
description: Chilling Reload increases  Cold damage and Reload Speed of Shotguns.

name: Drifting Contact
description: Drifting Contact is a rare Melee mod that extends the duration of the Melee Combo Counter and increases Status Chance.

name: Primed Cryo Rounds
description: The Primed Cryo Rounds mod increases  Cold damage of Rifles by 15% per rank for a maximum of 165% at rank 10.

However, as all Vay Hek Frequency Triangulator blueprints have been removed from all players, this resource currently serves no purpose.

name: Large Mortus Lungfish
description: Displays blood-splattered pattern on its scales and has its ribs exposed through open cavities along both flanks. When predators approach it lies still at the bottom of the sand banks, disguised as a carcass in hopes of being ignored.

name: Transistor Shield
description: Transistor Shield is a Warframe Augment Mod for Volt's Electric Shield that allows allies to pick up and move Electric Shields. Additionally, a percentage of enemy damage absorbed by the Electric Shield(s) will add up to Volt's Static Discharge passive.

name: Lith H1 Flawless
description: Void Relics are Orokin objects that can be opened to reveal valuable treasure enclosed within by completing Void Fissure missions. They are the principal means of acquiring Prime and Forma Blueprints.

name: Bane of Corrupted
description: Bane of Corrupted increases the damage of primary weapons against Corrupted. The mod increases both the base damage and elemental damage of a weapon.

name: Hunhow's Datascape Scene
description: Captura is an image capture and editing tool that allows players to manipulate and compose scenarios for screenshots.

name: Grineer Forest Water Pump Scene
description: Captura is an image capture and editing tool that allows players to manipulate and compose scenarios for screenshots.

name: Avenging Truth
description: Avenging Truth allows Silva & Aegis to absorb a percentage of incoming damage while blocking. Damage absorbed this way will be stored as extra damage for the next charge attack. It also adds a Truth effect.

name: Teshin's Refuge Scene
description: Captura is an image capture and editing tool that allows players to manipulate and compose scenarios for screenshots.

name: Harrow's Temple Scene
description: Captura is an image capture and editing tool that allows players to manipulate and compose scenarios for screenshots.

name: Medium Goopolla
description: A predatory fish that is attracted to the scent of blood.

name: Amaryn's Retreat Scene
description: Captura is an image capture and editing tool that allows players to manipulate and compose scenarios for screenshots.

name: Orvius Blade
description: The Orvius is a throwing melee weapon used by Teshin. The Orvius blueprint is awarded to players upon completion of The War Within quest.

name: Cressa's Garrison Scene
description: Captura is an image capture and editing tool that allows players to manipulate and compose scenarios for screenshots.

name: Large Mawfish
description: Its gaping maw allows it to scoop up smaller fish as it swims by them.

name: Medium Norg
description: This fish inhabits the shallows and feeds of crabs and other small crustaceans. When threatened it forces air into its brain to give it the impression of being much bigger than it normally is.

name: Grineer Forest Industry Scene
description: Captura is an image capture and editing tool that allows players to manipulate and compose scenarios for screenshots.

name: Nami Skyla Prime
description: The Nami Skyla Prime is the Prime variant to the Nami Skyla. It was released in Update 21.6 alongside Ballistica Prime and Hydroid Prime.

name: Large Norg
description: This fish inhabits the shallows and feeds of crabs and other small crustaceans. When threatened it forces air into its brain to give it the impression of being much bigger than it normally is.

name: Large Khut-Khut
description: A poisonous fish protected by a hard carapace around its skull.

name: Color Key Scene
description: Captura is an image capture and editing tool that allows players to manipulate and compose scenarios for screenshots.

name: Silva & Aegis Prime
description: The Silva & Aegis Prime are the Prime counterparts to the  Heat-based sword and shield combo weapons, Silva & Aegis.

name: Silva & Aegis Prime
description: The Silva & Aegis Prime are the Prime counterparts to the  Heat-based sword and shield combo weapons, Silva & Aegis.

name: Small Karkina
description: A crustacean that hunts during the twilight hours.

name: Cryo Rounds
description: The Cryo Rounds mod increases  Cold damage on a weapon by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at rank 5.

name: Small Glappid
description: The Glappid is a scavenger that feasts on the remains of dead fish. It has formed a symbiotic bond with the Seram Beetle which extracts and feeds upon any toxins ingested by the Glappid.

name: Twirling Spire
description: Twirling Spire is a Stance Mod for polearms that allows for a mix of sweeping attacks with precise strikes.

name: Auxiliary Power
description: Auxiliary Power increases the maximum energy reserve of an Archwing by 15% per rank at a maximum of 90% at rank 5.

name: Scavenge
description: Scavenge mod gives Kubrows and Kavats a chance to unlock lockers.

name: Gunslinger
description: The Gunslinger mod increases the fire rate of secondary weapons by 12% per rank for a maximum of 72% at rank 5.

name: Small Charc Eel
description: Discharges electricity from luminous glands along its flanks to stun its prey.

name: Sundering Weave
description: Sundering Weave is the only available Stance mod for Machete-type weapons. It specializes in steady strikes combined with forward-striking finishers.

name: Medium Murkray
description: A cunning hunter that hides within the mud at the bottom of the lake and ambushes passing prey.

name: Tranquil Cleave
description: Tranquil Cleave is a Stance mod for Nikanas. This stance features swift and precise single-handed slashes.

name: Medium Sharrac
description: While rarely venturing from the deepest of waters of the plains, the Sharrac is a fearsome predator who will prey on unwary Ostrons swimming alone.

name: Greedy Pull
description: Greedy Pull is a Warframe Augment Mod that gives Mag's Pull the ability to attract pickups towards herself.

name: Silva & Aegis Prime
description: The Silva & Aegis Prime are the Prime counterparts to the  Heat-based sword and shield combo weapons, Silva & Aegis.

name: Sanctuary
description: Sanctuary allows a Sentinel to create a shield around its master while they heal fallen allies.

name: Tether Grenades
description: Tether Grenades is an Index Mod for the Penta that causes launched grenades to stick to level geometry and pull nearby enemies. Additionally, grenades will stop bouncing from enemies, and instead they will fly straight through them. It also adds delayed self-detonation to grenades.

name: Aviator
description: Aviator reduces damage taken while airborne.

name: Swooping Falcon
description: Swooping Falcon is a stance mod for swords

name: Link Health
description: Link Health is a Kubrow mod that increases its health based on a percentage of the player's health. The player's health is unaffected by this mod.

name: Large Sharrac
description: While rarely venturing from the deepest of waters of the plains, the Sharrac is a fearsome predator who will prey on unwary Ostrons swimming alone.

name: Pack Leader
description: Pack Leader is a mod that heals an incubated companion by a percentage of the damage dealt by a player with melee attacks.

name: Stockpiled Blight
description: Stockpiled Blight Increases the magazine size of the Kunai and also adds a Blight effect.

name: Soul Survivor
description: Soul Survivor is a Warframe Augment Mod that allows Nekros to use Soul Punch on allies in bleedout to revive them with partial health, at the cost of consuming all of Nekros's energy.

name: Molecular Conversion
description: Molecular Conversion is a precept mod for the Taxon Sentinel that allows it to attack enemies within 10 meters with a beam that deals  Radiation damage, and converts the damage it deals into Shields for the Warframe.

name: Thumper
description: Thumper allows Djinn to attack the first visible enemy within range.

name: Fracturing Wind
description: Fracturing Wind is one of three Stance Mods for Fist type weapons. Wielders of this Stance can deliver a barrage of fast punches and deliver powerful knockdowns.

name: Fulmination
description: Fulmination increases the AoE damage radius of launcher-type sidearms.

name: Ammo Drum
description: Ammo Drum increases the maximum amount of rifle ammunition your Warframe can carry for that weapon.

name: Sovereign Outcast
description: Sovereign Outcast is a Stance mod for Tonfa-type weapons.

name: Gladiator Might
description: Gladiator Might is a set mod that increases the critical damage of a melee weapon.

name: Heavy Impact
description: Heavy Impact allows a Warframe to create shockwave from heavy landings that knocks foes off their feet.

name: Medium Mawfish
description: Its gaping maw allows it to scoop up smaller fish as it swims by them.

name: Magus Cloud
description: Magus Cloud is an Arcane Enhancement for the operator that grants a chance to become immune to fall damage after a void dash.

name: Revenge
description: Revenge allows Shade to attack enemies but only if they attacked its owner.

name: Shell Shock
description: The Shell Shock mod increases both the  Electricity damage and Status Chance of a shotgun by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

name: Thunderbolt
description: The Thunderbolt mod gives arrows from Bows a 7.5% chance per rank of exploding on impact for a maximum of 30% chance at Rank 3, dealing 250  Blast damage to the target, as well as to nearby enemies within 10 meters of the blast (scaled by distance).

name: Blade of Truth
description: The Blade of Truth mod is a Weapon Augment Mod that increases melee damage and Truth specifically for the Jaw Sword. It increases melee damage by 25% and Truth by 0.25 per rank, at a maximum of 100% and 1 at rank 3, respectively.

name: Striker
description: Striker mod allows Carrier to attack the first visible enemy in range.

name: Primed Chamber
description: Not to be confused with Charged Chamber.

name: Pool of Life
description: Pool Of Life is a Warframe Augment Mod that makes enemies marked by Trinity's Well Of Life drop Health Orbs upon death, with a chance to drop an additional Energy Orb.

name: Focus Energy
description: The Focus Energy mod increases Channeling efficiency and  Electricity damage on melee weapons by 10% and 15% per rank, at a maximum of 40% and 60% at rank 3, respectively.

name: Corrupt Charge
description: Corrupt Charge increases the Channeling damage of melee weapons while reducing Channeling efficiency.

name: Hawk Eye
description: Hawk Eye increases the zoom of secondary weapons.  Beginning with Update 12.6, Hawk Eye also increases the range at which Sentinels can shoot enemies if installed on a Sentinel Weapon.

name: Concussion Rounds
description: Concussion Rounds increases the  Impact damage done by Pistols.

name: Howl
description: Howl mod allows Raksa Kubrow to cry out a blood-curdling howl to strike fear into its foes.

name: Link Shields
description: Link Shields increases a Kubrow's maximum shields by adding a percent of the Warframe's shields to its own shields.

name: Equilibrium
description: Equilibrium restores additional Energy when collecting Health Orbs, and additional Health when collecting Energy Orbs. Converted orbs are denoted by a  symbol.

name: Entropy Burst
description: The Entropy Burst mod is a Weapon Augment Mod that increases status chance and Entropy specifically for the Supra. It increases status chance by a flat +5 and Entropy by +0.25 per rank, at a maximum of +20 and 1 at rank 3, respectively.

name: Fatal Attraction
description: Fatal Attraction allows Djinn to damage nearby enemies.

name: Seismic Palm
description: Seismic Palm is one of three Stance mods for fist weapons like the Furax. It features staggering and knockdowns.

name: Rush
description: The Rush mod increases the speed at which a Warframe moves while sprinting. Rush also increases the distance that both vertical and horizontal wall running maneuvers can cover.

name: Pressure Point
description: Pressure Point increases damage on melee weapons by 20% per rank, at a maximum of 120% at rank 5.

name: Constitution
description: Constitution increases Warframe Knockdown Recovery and Power Duration of Warframe abilities.

name: Infected Clip
description: Infected Clip increases  Toxin damage done by rifles.

name: Smite Infusion
description: Smite Infusion is a Warframe Augment Mod for Oberon that allows Smite to be cast on allies, temporarily granting them additional  Radiation damage to all attacks.

name: Modified Munitions
description: The Modified Munitions mod increases the status effect chance of Archwing guns by 10% per rank at a maximum of 60% at rank 5.

name: Cleanse Infested
description: The Cleanse Infested mod increases the base damage of shotguns against Infested by 5% per rank for a maximum of 30% at rank 5.

name: Natural Talent
description: Natural Talent improves casting speed of most Warframe abilities.

name: Blaze
description: Blaze increases both overall damage and  Heat damage to shotguns by 15% per rank, at a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

name: Haven
description: Haven is a Warframe Augment Mod for Limbo that makes Banish restore a portion of an injured ally's health.

name: Flechette
description: Flechette increases the  Puncture damage of shotguns.

name: Shimmering Blight
description: Shimmering Blight is a Stance Mod for polearms that allows for rapid, spinning strikes which hit multiple enemies, and finishes with powerful, slashing strikes.

name: Loyal Companion
description: Loyal Companion is a Kubrow and Kavat mod that allows the owner to share their Bleedout time as an extension to their companion's Bleedout time.

name: Justice Blades
description: The Justice Blades mod is a Weapon Augment Mod that increases melee damage and Justice specifically for the Dual Cleavers. It increases melee damage by 25% and Justice by 0.25 per rank, at a maximum of 100% at ranks 1 and 3, respectively.

name: Decisive Judgement
description: Decisive Judgement is a Stance Mod for Nikanas, which features two-handed slashes that can send the user airborne.

name: Buzz Kill
description: The Buzz Kill mod increases  Slash damage of a melee weapon by 20% per rank for a maximum of 120% at rank 5.

name: Vacuum
description: Vacuum allows a Sentinel to detect and collect Pickups, Ammo, and Mods within the area.

name: Hornet Strike
description: Hornet Strike increases the base damage of secondary weapons by 20% per rank, at a maximum of 220% at rank 10.

name: Secura Dual Cestra
description: The Secura Dual Cestra is a modified version of the Dual Cestra exclusive to The Perrin Sequence, featuring better stats and innate Sequence effect.

name: Creeping Bullseye
description: The Creeping Bullseye mod increases the critical hit chance by 8% per rank while reducing the Fire Rate by -6% per rank of pistols for a maximum of 48% critical hit chance and -36% fire rate at rank 5.

name: Mutalist Alad V Assassinate
description: The Mutalist Alad V Assassinate Key is built from a blueprint awarded upon completion of the Patient Zero quest. The blueprint is reusable. Mutalist Nav Coordinates can be acquired as Battle Pay rewards from Infestation Outbreak[1] and Orokin Derelict Survival/Defense missions and resource caches from hive sabotage. Upon using the key, the cell will be taken to an Infested Ship on Eris where they must face Mutalist Alad V.

name: Irradiating Disarm
description: Irradiating Disarm is a Loki Warframe Augment Mod for Radial Disarm that allows it to inflict the Confusion Status Effect on enemies.

name: Antimatter Absorb
description: Antimatter Absorb is a Warframe Augment Mod for Nova's Antimatter Drop that gives it an Absorb field to absorb incoming enemy gunfire, adding to its total damage potential.

name: Arcane Acceleration
description: Arcane Acceleration is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance on each critical hit to increase the rate of fire of rifle weapons for a short time.

name: Arcane Awakening
description: Arcane Awakening is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance on reloading any weapon to increase the damage of secondary weapons for a short time.

name: Arcane Barrier
description: Arcane Barrier is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance whenever the player receives damage to instantly restore shields.

name: Arcane Ice
description: Arcane Ice is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance to resist a  Heat damage effect entirely.

name: Eternal War
description: Eternal War is a Warframe Augment Mod for Valkyr that extends Warcry's duration for each melee kill.

name: Four Riders
description: Four Riders is a Rare Stance mod for Claw-type weapons, featuring fast strikes and powerful slams.

name: Full Contact
description: The Full Contact mod increases  Impact damage of shotguns by 20% per rank for a maximum of 120% at rank 5.

name: Animal Instinct
description: Animal Instinct is a Companion mod that gives Enemy Sense and Loot Detection effects to the companion's owner. It can be equipped on both Sentinels and Kubrows.[1] Unlike the equivalent Warframe auras (with which these effects stack), these effects only apply to the owner and not the other players in the squad, and they cease if the companion dies during the mission.

name: Prisma Dual Cleavers
description: The Prisma Dual Cleavers are the special Prisma version of the Dual Cleavers, featuring enhanced attack speed and status chance, while lowering  Puncture and  Impact damages to increase  Slash damage.

name: Final Harbinger
description: Final Harbinger is a Stance mod for Sword and Shield melee weapons.

name: Patagium
description: Patagium is a Warframe mod that increases the duration of Aim Glide and Wall Latch.

name: Covert Lethality
description: Covert Lethality is a mod that increases the base attack damage of single daggers and deals lethal damage on finishers.

name: Combustion Beam
description: Combustion Beam  causes enemies killed by beam weapons to explode, dealing up to 600 damage shortly after death.

name: Prisma Skana
description: The Prisma Skana is a special Prisma version of the Skana longsword, featuring enhanced attack speed, critical chance and critical damage.

name: Vaykor Hek
description: The Vaykor Hek is a Hek variant available only from Steel Meridian. Boasting double the magazine capacity of the base variant, a faster rate of fire, and an increased critical chance, the Vaykor Hek also comes with an innate Justice effect. It does, however, take slightly longer to reload than the base variant.

name: Telos Boltor
description: The Telos Boltor is an exclusive version of the Boltor available only from the Arbiters of Hexis. Featuring improved stats and an additional polarity slot, the Telos Boltor also features innate Truth effect.

name: Fast Deflection
description: Fast Deflection increases the Shield recharge rate of a Warframe. It has no effect on the recharge delay.

name: Electro Pulse
description: Electro Pulse allows the Diriga sentinel to repeatedly stun a single enemy within range using  Electricity status effect .

name: Neutralize
description: Neutralize is a Kubrow exclusive mod that allows the Chesa Kubrow to disarm enemies.

name: Staggering Shield
description: Staggering Shield is a Warframe Augment Mod for Mesa that gives shots reflected by Shatter Shield a chance to stagger enemies.

name: Purifying Flames
description: Purifying Flames is a PvP Warframe Augment Mod for Ember's Fire Blast that causes allies who enter the fire to have debuffs removed.

name: Retrieve
description: Retrieve is a Kubrow exclusive mod that allows the Chesa Kubrow to retrieve items.

name: Cataclysmic Continuum
description: Cataclysmic Continuum is a Warframe Augment Mod for Limbo that extends Cataclysm's duration for every enemy killed inside it. This mod does not increase the duration beyond the maximum duration of Cataclysm, and the added seconds do not increase the Cataclysm's size.

name: Defiled Snapdragon
description: Defiled Snapdragon is a Stance Mod for Blade and Whip type weapons.

name: Arcane Arachne
description: Arcane Arachne is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance whenever the player wall latches to increase damage for the next hit on an enemy.

name: Arcane Momentum
description: Arcane Momentum is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance to increase the Fire Rate on Sniper-type weapons whenever the player achieves a critical Hit.

name: Arcane Precision
description: Arcane Precision is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance whenever the player upon achieving a headshot to increase Damage on Secondaries for a short time.

name: Arcane Ultimatum
description: Arcane Ultimatum is an Arcane Enhancement that, upon performing a melee finisher, provides a chance to increase Warframe Armor for a short time.

name: Gun Glide
description: Gun Glide is a rifle mod usable in both PvE and PvP that reduces recoil and spread when firing while sliding.

name: Rime Vault
description: Rime Vault is a PvP-exclusive Exilus mod that increases Bullet Jump speed and grants  Cold damage to Bullet Jumps at Max Energy.

name: Twitch
description: Twitch is a rifle mod usable in both PvE and PvP that increases the holster rate of rifles.

name: Vanquished Prey
description: Vanquished Prey was a PvP-exclusive rifle mod that gave a chance to restore shields on kill.

name: Venomous Rise
description: Venomous Rise is a PvP-exclusive Exilus mod that increases Bullet Jump speed and grants  Toxin damage to Bullet Jumps at Max Energy.

name: Voltaic Lance
description: Voltaic Lance is a PvP-exclusive Exilus mod that increases Bullet Jump speed and grants  Electricity damage to Bullet Jumps at Max Energy.

name: Adrenaline Boost
description: Adrenaline Boost is a PvP-exclusive Warframe mod which provides more Energy at the cost of reduced Health.

name: Blind Shot
description: Blind Shot is a PvP-exclusive pistol mod which provides faster projectile flight speed at the cost of reduced accuracy.

name: Deft Tempo
description: Deft Tempo is PvP-exclusive assault rifle mod which increases Bullet Jump on Headshots. It is no longer usable with Launcher weapons since Update 18.5.

name: Directed Convergence
description: Directed Convergence is PvP-exclusive Supra mod which increases Accuracy when aiming.

name: Double Tap
description: Double Tap is PvP-exclusive Latron mod which increases Damage on Hits.

name: Feathered Arrows
description: Feathered Arrows  is a PvP-exclusive Bow mod which provides faster projectile flight speed at the cost of reduced damage.

name: Final Act
description: Final Act is a PvP-exclusive Warframe mod which increases Power Efficiency and Power Range for 4 seconds at low health

name: Final Tap
description: Final Tap is PvP-exclusive Hind mod which increases damage on 4 Hits within 0.5 seconds, effectively meaning that if the first 4 shots of the Hind's 5-shot burst land, the final shot will have extra damage.

name: Hydraulic Barrel
description: Hydraulic Barrel is a PvP-exclusive secondary weapon mod which reduces weapon recoil at the cost of reduced magazine capacity.

name: Hydraulic Chamber
description: Hydraulic Chamber is a PvP-exclusive shotgun mod which reduces weapon recoil at the cost of reduced magazine capacity.

name: Hydraulic Gauge
description: Hydraulic Gauge is PvP-exclusive assault rifle mod which reduces weapon recoil at the cost of reduced magazine capacity.

name: Kill Switch
description: Kill Switch is PvP-exclusive Shotgun mod which increases Reload Speed on Kills.

name: Loaded Capacity
description: Loaded Capacity is a PvP-exclusive shotgun mod which grants increased magazine capacity at the cost of reduced reload speed.

name: Loose Chamber
description: Loose Chamber is a PvP-exclusive shotgun mod which grants improved reload speed at the cost of increased recoil.

name: Loose Hatch
description: Loose Hatch is a PvP-exclusive assault rifle mod which grants improved reload speed at the cost of increased recoil.

name: Armored Evade
description: Armored Evade is a PvP-exclusive Warframe mod that reduces Slide and increases Damage Resistance while dodging.

name: Catalyzer Link
description: Catalyzer Link is a common Rifle mod that increases Status chance while aiming for a brief time after casting an ability.

name: Nano-Applicator
description: Nano-Applicator is a rare Shotgun mod that increases Status chance while aiming for a brief time after casting an ability.

name: Narrow Barrel
description: Narrow Barrel is a shotgun mod that temporarily increases accuracy while aiming upon hitting an enemy.

name: Focused Defense
description: Focused Defense is a melee mod that increases armor while channeling at the cost of reduced channeling efficiency.

name: Guided Ordinance
description: Guided Ordnance is an assault rifle mod that temporarily increases accuracy while aiming upon hitting an enemy.

name: Targeting Subsystem
description: Targeting Subsystem is a Pistol mod that temporarily increases accuracy while aiming upon hitting an enemy.

name: Strun Wraith
description: The Strun Wraith is the first Wraith weapon, which was made available as a reward for the Survival Weekend Event. It is a modified version of the Strun shotgun, featuring improved stats and firing characteristics.

name: Ore Gaze
description: Ore Gaze is a Warframe Augment Mod for Atlas that modifies Petrify to cause enemies turned to stone to be scanned into the codex and have a chance to make them drop extra loot.

name: Tectonic Fracture
description: Tectonic Fracture is a Warframe Augment Mod for Atlas that modifies Tectonics to allow additional simultaneous walls, but sacrifices the ability to turn them into offensive boulders.

name: Titanic Rumbler
description: Titanic Rumbler is a Warframe Augment Mod for Atlas that modifies Rumblers to make one, larger Rumbler with modified stats, as opposed to the normal two Rumblers.

name: Duality
description: Duality is a Warframe Augment Mod for Equinox that causes her opposite form to split from her when casting Metamorphosis, creating a Specter armed with the weapon Equinox was using during casting.

name: Calm & Frenzy
description: Calm & Frenzy is a Warframe Augment Mod for Equinox that aids  her in spreading the effects of Rest & Rage. Enemies slain while affected by Rest & Rage spreads it to others within close proximity, for a fraction of the remaining duration.

name: Peaceful Provocation
description: Peaceful Provocation is a Warframe Augment Mod for Equinox that increases the effectiveness of Pacify & Provoke. Pacify converts damage done to Equinox and her allies into an aura that slows enemies by up to 40%. Provoke converts damage done to enemies within the aura into up to 15% bonus Power Strength.

name: Nikana Prime
description: The Nikana Prime is the primed version of the Nikana, added in Hotfix 18.4.12.

name: Spira Prime
description: The Spira Prime is the Primed variant of the Spira throwing daggers featuring a boost to its Fire Rate, Reload Speed, Status Effect chance, Critical chance and Critical multiplier in exchange for reduced damage.

name: Sheev
description: The Sheev is a close range dagger weapon of Grineer design that serves as a backup in the event that a Grineer is disarmed by any means. It offers high  Slash damage and status, but has a slow overall attack speed. The tip of the blade glows with charged plasma, which allows the weapon to deal  Heat procs on slam attacks.

name: Mesa’s Waltz
description: Mesa's Waltz is a PvP-only Warframe Augment Mod that allows Mesa to roll while channeling Peacemaker, at the cost of some energy.

name: Rumbled
description: Rumbled is a Warframe Augment Mod for Atlas's Rumblers in PvP that transforms Atlas into a Rumbler and grants additional armor that absorbs damage.

name: Push & Pull
description: Push & Pull is a Warframe Augment Mod for Equinox's Metamorphosis in PvP that Staggers enemies within 6m when switching to day-form, or knocks them down if switching to night-form.

name: Sands of Inaros
description: Sands of Inaros is an optional Quest introduced in Update 18.5, involving Baro Ki'Teer's interest in the hidden treasures underneath Mars. Completing this quest will reward the Inaros Warframe.

name: Harkonar Scope
description: Harkonar Scope is a Sniper Mod that increases a sniper rifle's combo duration while aiming.

name: Acid Shells
description: Acid Shells is a Sobek-exclusive mod that causes enemies killed by the Sobek to explode, dealing a flat amount of  Corrosive damage plus a percentage of the enemy's maximum health in an area of effect.

name: Medi-Ray
description: Medi-Ray is a Sentinel precept mod that allows a sentinel to periodically restore a percentage of its owner's health over 4 seconds.

name: Nightwatch Napalm
description: Nightwatch Napalm is an Ogris-exclusive mod that, upon striking an enemy or object, small pockets of fire will form a ring around the impact area, dealing 30% of the weapons base  Blast damage as  Heat damage with 100% chance to proc, for 6 seconds.

name: Electromagnetic Shielding
description: Electromagnetic Shielding is an Ack & Brunt-exclusive mod that transfers a percentage of damage and all Status Effects that nearby allies receive to yourself, but only when you are blocking.

name: Energy Field
description: Energy Field is an Odonata Augment Mod for Energy Shell that extends its effects to nearby allies within a set distance.

name: Quasar Drill
description: The Quasar Drill mod adds/increases Puncture b Puncture damage of an Arch-Gun by 15% per rank for maximum of 90% at Rank 5.

name: Comet Blast
description: The Comet Blast mods adds/Increases Impact b Impact damage of an Arch-gun by 15% per rank for maximum of 90% at max Rank.

name: Meteor Crash
description: The Meteor Crash mod adds/increases  Impact damage of an Arch-melee by 15% per rank for maximum of 90% at Rank 5.

name: Lith F1 Flawless
description: Void Relics are Orokin objects that can be opened to reveal valuable treasure enclosed within by completing Void Fissure missions. They are the principal means of acquiring Prime and Forma Blueprints.

name: Toxin Resistance
description: Toxin Resistance is an Aura that reduces poison damage by 2.5% per rank, up to 15% at max. This can be stacked with other teammates' to reduce the damage by 60%. Its effects are identical to Antitoxin.

name: Ignis Wraith Blueprint
description: The Ignis Wraith is the Wraith version of the Ignis flamethrower, featuring improved stats and firing characteristics.

name: Augur Pact
description: Augur Pact is a set mod available from bounties on the Plains of Eidolon. It increases the damage of secondaries by 90% at max rank, with the full set bonus applied 150% of energy spent with abilities is converted into Shields

name: Anasa Ayatan Sculpture
description: Ayatan Sculptures are ancient Orokin treasures powered by Endo that can be discovered across the system. There are two types available: the Sculptures themselvеs, and smaller Stars which can be inserted into the larger Sculptures to increase their value. These can be traded to Maroo at her Bazaar for varying amounts of Endo, or placed within the Orbiter as decorations.

name: Medium Charc Eel
description: Discharges electricity from luminous glands along its flanks to stun its prey.

name: Cleanse Corrupted
description: Cleanse Corrupted increases the damage of shotguns against Corrupted. The mod increases both the base damage and elemental damage of a weapon.

name: Trample
description: The Trample mod allows the Helminth Charger to tackle a nearby opponent. The tackle can also hit multiple targets.

name: Vigilante Offense
description: Vigilante Offense is a set mod that increases Punch Through for primary weapons.

name: Gladiator Finesse
description: Gladiator Finesse is a set mod that uses a Warframe's residual energy pool as an emergency buffer to prevent death when the Warframe's health reaches 2.

name: Kappa Beacon
description: Beacons were resources dropped by Grineer Prosecutors. They work similarly to Nav Coordinates and were required to build the Vay Hek Frequency Triangulator, which was previously used to access the Councilor Vay Hek Assassination mission. However, as all Vay Hek Frequency Triangulator blueprints have been removed from all players, this resource currently serves no purpose.

name: Augur Secrets
description: Augur Secrets is a set mod available from bounties on the Plains of Eidolon. It increases the Ability Strength of the Warframe by +24% at max rank, with the full Set Bonus applied the 150% of the Energy spent with the Abilities is converted into Shields.

name: Medium Glappid
description: The Glappid is a scavenger that feasts on the remains of dead fish. It has formed a symbiotic bond with the Seram Beetle which extracts and feeds upon any toxins ingested by the Glappid.

name: Star Crimzian
description: Star Crimzian is a resource used to craft weapon parts.

name: Proboscis
description: The Proboscis mod allows the Helminth Charger to grapple and drag enemies.

name: Medium Yogwun
description: This slow fish meanders through the waters and is often preyed upon by larger predators.

name: Small Sharrac
description: While rarely venturing from the deepest of waters of the plains, the Sharrac is a fearsome predator who will prey on unwary Ostrons swimming alone.

name: Guided Effigy
description: Guided Effigy is a Warframe Augment Mod for Chroma's Effigy that allows him to control the Effigy, dealing rapid damage to enemies in its path and stunning enemies at the destination.

name: Magus Husk
description: Magus Husk is an Arcane Enhancement for the Operator that grants them additional armor upon transferring out of the Warframe.

name: Virtuos Strike
description: Virtuos Strike is an Arcane Enhancement for the Operator Amps that grants a chance at increased critical damage after a critical hit.

name: Magus Replenish
description: Magus Replenish is an Arcane Enhancement for the Operator that has a chance to restore health after performing a Void Dash.

name: Exodia Might
description: Exodia Might is an Arcane Enhancement for Zaws that has a chance to grant lifesteal on finishers.

name: Magus Elevate
description: Magus Elevate is an Arcane Enhancement for the Operator that grants a chance to restore health to a Warframe after transferring into it.
